against all odds.name: Against All Odds
against all odds.desc: For each combat tag you have on your character, increase your damage by 1% (max of 7%).

emergency reserves.name: Emergency Reserves
emergency reserves.desc: When you get hit below 20% health, gain 20% tempo immediately (3 minute CD).

unswayed.name: Unswayed
unswayed.desc: The effects of Taunt and Encore no longer work on you.

kick off.name: Kick Off
kick off.desc: You easily brush off shorter falls, taking no damage. Your first wall jump will always send you higher than normal. Gain a speed boost after wall jumping over a wall.

steady footing.name: Steady Footing
steady footing.desc: You're much more resistant to being pushed around. You don't slide on ice.

time to go.name: Time To Go
time to go.desc: Taking a life grants a speed boost for 10 seconds. Taking a player's life doubles the speed boost and the duration.

an ironsinger's instinct.name: An Ironsinger's Instinct
an ironsinger's instinct.desc: Successfully dodging an attack coats you in metal and reduces the damage of the next attack damage taken. 18s CD.

phantom edge.name: Phantom Edge
phantom edge.desc: Your weapon Basic Attacks have +0.25 range.

exposed durability.name: Exposed Durability
exposed durability.desc: Deal +10% damage to opponents with no armor durability left.

neural overload.name: Neural Overload
neural overload.desc: You can input up to 4 copies of each Mantra ingredient instead of being limited to 3.

everchanging aegis.name: Everchanging Aegis
everchanging aegis.desc: You take 20% less damage from attacks the same element as the last element you were hit with, but 10% more damage from attacks from different elements.

overflowing dam.name: Overflowing Dam
overflowing dam.desc:
Having full Ether for 2 seconds or more grants an aura to your attacks that grants them 5%-10% more damage.
[*The percentage of gained damage scales with your Intelligence between 0 INT and 40 INT.]

perfect flash.name: Perfect Flash
perfect flash.desc: Having over 95% health causes your mantras to do +25% more damage. This damage bonus will scale down to 10% if your enemies are far away.

wyvern's claw [hvy].name: Wyvern's Claw [HVY]
wyvern's claw [hvy].desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne. Mantras receive a 5% bonus to damage instead.

wyvern's claw [lht].name: Wyvern's Claw [LHT]
wyvern's claw [lht].desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne. Mantras receive a 5% bonus to damage instead.

wyvern's claw [med].name: Wyvern's Claw [MED]
wyvern's claw [med].desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne. Mantras receive a 5% bonus to damage instead.

aerogliding.name: Aerogliding
aerogliding.desc: When falling from a high place, hold spacebar to generate wind currents until you hit the floor. Also gives you more airtime with Gliders.

stifled jump.name: Stifled Jump
stifled jump.desc: Enemies who jump while suffocated by you are dazed.

aeronade.name: Aeronade
aeronade.desc: Your trap automatically detonates on contact with an object.

gale trap.name: Gale Trap
gale trap.desc: Knocking a player tags them with a wind trap, cause anyone to pick up that body to get sent flying. However, if you pick up the body you gain the speed boost for 20 seconds.

suffocating impact.name: Suffocating Impact
suffocating impact.desc: When flourishing enemies into walls they are suffocated and winded for a short duration.

vacuum punch.name: Vacuum Punch
vacuum punch.desc: Your Gale Punch pulls enemies in before you hit them.

placebo effect.name: Placebo Effect
placebo effect.desc: Drinking potions near allies will share the potion's effect with them.

potion quaffer [ftd].name: Potion Quaffer [FTD]
potion quaffer [ftd].desc: You're accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly. You'll get along famously with the other patrons at the tavern. Drinking potions slows you down less and grants superior regenerative effects to you.

potion quaffer [wil].name: Potion Quaffer [WIL]
potion quaffer [wil].desc: You're accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly. You'll get along famously with the other patrons at the tavern. Drinking potions slows you down less and grants superior regenerative effects to you.

apothecary.name: Apothecary
apothecary.desc: Potions you prepare will have amplified positive effects when consumed, and amplified negative effects when thrown.

chain reaction.name: Chain Reaction
chain reaction.desc: When applying a potion effect to someone who already has one, the new effect is amplified. You have a 25% chance not to deplete potions when drinking them.

chemist's bag.name: Chemist's Bag
chemist's bag.desc: You no longer drop Potions on death.

wild alchemy.name: Wild Alchemy
wild alchemy.desc: You have a chance to brew 2 potions instead of 1.

approaching singularity.name: Approaching Singularity
approaching singularity.desc: You now gain +1% Mantra PEN for every 10 points of Intelligence.

conditioned runner.name: Conditioned Runner
conditioned runner.desc: You regenerate health faster than normal when sprinting below 75% HP. The health amount scales with your agility stat.

endurance runner.name: Endurance Runner
endurance runner.desc: Even when things look dire, you still have it in you to keep your legs moving.

scaredy cat.name: Scaredy Cat
scaredy cat.desc: When enemies initiate a fight with you, gain a speed boost.

flame within.name: Flame Within
flame within.desc: An application of Pleeksty's concept of the inner flame, also known as the soul of man. Set yourself ablaze to gain 10% extra damage and 10% extra speed.

fisher's lure.name: Fisher's Lure
fisher's lure.desc: Fish are drawn to your line more quickly.

hook, line, and sinker.name: Hook, Line, and Sinker
hook, line, and sinker.desc: Once something's caught your line, it's much harder to get loose.

proficient baiting.name: Proficient Baiting
proficient baiting.desc: Casting your line excites ocean life, reducing the chances of fishing up trash.

collapsed lung.name: Collapsed Lung
collapsed lung.desc: Block breaking an opponent closes off their ability to Vent for 8s, with this duration scaling with Strength.

grand feast.name: Grand Feast
grand feast.desc: Regain ether, tempo, blood, and health from killing.

sunken predator.name: Sunken Predator
sunken predator.desc: Enemies you hit in the water or the depths have their speed buffs nullified and are slowed.

carnivore.name: Carnivore
carnivore.desc: In return for losing the ability to eat vegetation, sate your hunger by gripping monsters and people alike.

devastating power.name: Devastating Power
devastating power.desc: Gain extra Ether for every Mantra in your arsenal.

oath: arcwarder.name: Oath: Arcwarder
oath: arcwarder.desc: You vow to be a shield for your comrades, to wear your regalia with pride and serve the greater collective. From each according to their ability, to each according to their needs.

arc module: dash.name: Arc Module: Dash
arc module: dash.desc: When Arc Suit is active, your dashes become Jet dashes allowing you to attack while dashing.

arc module: eject.name: Arc Module: Eject
arc module: eject.desc: When block broken with Arc Suit active, eject from the armor.

arc module: guard.name: Arc Module: Guard
arc module: guard.desc: Blocking with your Arc Suit active negates all backstabs and allows you to block attacks from behind.

arc module: leap.name: Arc Module: Leap
arc module: leap.desc: Holding Spacebar after double jumping propels you up for a short duration.

arc module: null.name: Arc Module: Null
arc module: null.desc: When your Arc suit is active, outgoing and incoming enchant effects are nullified.

master craftsman.name: Master Craftsman
master craftsman.desc: Your skills alone substitute the need for a Craft Station.

deep wound.name: Deep Wound
deep wound.desc: Assassinating a target applies anti-heal for 20s and gives you a speed boost for 3s. Assassination damage now scales with level against mobs.

lights out.name: Lights Out
lights out.desc: Assassinations now give you 30% PEN and blind the target for 5s. Those you carry are now blindfolded.

lowstride.name: Lowstride
lowstride.desc: When crouching, your stealth and roll distance are increased. The speed penalty you receive from crouching is much smaller. You now draw and sheathe your weapon silently.

unseen threat.name: Unseen Threat
unseen threat.desc: You can assassinate those with weapons out provided you're not in combat yourself. Those you assassinate are slowed and unable to jump for 5s.

riot breaker.name: Riot Breaker
riot breaker.desc: You receive 15% less posture damage and deal 10% more posture damage when under attack by 3 or more enemies.

authority intimidation.name: Authority Intimidation
authority intimidation.desc: Lightning moves slow your opponent more.

first interrogation.name: First Interrogation
first interrogation.desc: Attacks from opponents who are Electrified will give you Ether proportional to their initial damage.

resolve crusher.name: Resolve Crusher
resolve crusher.desc: Lightning moves now apply stacks of 'Resolve Crusher'. At 4 stacks, you apply 'Electrified' to your opponent. Attacks from Electrified opponents are converted into Lightning damage, but will deal 10% less damage to you.

second interrogation.name: Second Interrogation
second interrogation.desc: Opponents who are electrified do 50% less damage to you and do 50% less posture damage to you.

reinforced armor.name: Reinforced Armor
reinforced armor.desc:
Incoming PEN is reduced by 30%.
[Note: Scales with investment. Having less Fortitude reduces the effect of this Talent, with a minimum of 10%.]

reqs.from: Battle Tendency, Braced Collapse, Perseverance, Moving Fortress

battle tendency.name: Battle Tendency
battle tendency.desc: You can breathe more easily with +20% faster posture regen.

braced collapse.name: Braced Collapse
braced collapse.desc: After being block broken, the next attack to hit you deals reduced damage.

moving fortress.name: Moving Fortress
moving fortress.desc: Blocking no longer slows you down as much.

perseverance.name: Perseverance
perseverance.desc: When you're knocked down, you get back up again more quickly.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc: One with nothing to lose has everything to gain. Succumb to the burning rage within, nullifying your own armor in exchange for nullifying the armor of your foes on your Basic Attacks. Grants your Criticals +10% PEN while active.

oath: bladeharper.name: Oath: Bladeharper
oath: bladeharper.desc: You vow to carry your blades as an instrument, to lend yourself to any cause it guides you to. Collapse the infinite number of possibilities ahead of you into just one. The blade keeps you as much as you keep it.

float like a butterfly.name: Float Like a Butterfly
float like a butterfly.desc: In a display of true strength, cancel your air dash to enter a frenzy of slashes. (5s CD)

lithe step.name: Lithe Step
lithe step.desc: When sprinting, roll-cancel and instantly vanish and surge with unmatched speed.

reveal.name: Reveal
reveal.desc: Pour your heart out and reveal your true strength

untouchable.name: Untouchable
untouchable.desc: By landing consecutive hits on your opponent without taking any damage, reveal your true strength for a short duration.

soaring storm.name: Soaring Storm
soaring storm.desc: Empower your uppercuts with the way of the blade, after Lithe Stepping, flourishing, or landing an oath ability.

oath: blightsurger.name: Oath: Blightsurger
oath: blightsurger.desc: Fists and storm. Wield sacred lightning, tear through foes and leave them withered.

sovereign state.name: Sovereign State
sovereign state.desc: Landing physical hits builds your Blight Meter. At full gauge, enter a Blight State that changes your critical and empowers Blightsurge abilities.

blightpierce.name: Blightpierce
blightpierce.desc: Your Blightshock attacks pierce through your enemies hyperarmor and gain more penetration.

blighted touch.name: Blighted Touch
blighted touch.desc: Landing Basic Attacks during Sovereign State now applies Blightshock.

anchor shock.name: Anchor Shock
anchor shock.desc: Your Blightshock prevents targets from using mobility mantras.

oath: blindseer.name: Oath: Blindseer
oath: blindseer.desc: You vow to not let the horrors of the world pierce your tightly fastened blindfold. Everything is simply as we choose to perceive it.

all-seeing eye.name: All-Seeing Eye
all-seeing eye.desc: The mystic eye through which you now see the world can perceive the imperceptible. Invisible foes are highlighted.

smell of blood.name: Smell of Blood
smell of blood.desc:
When people touch a blood pool, briefly see their blood and blood poison.
[*Note: This Talent does proc on guardbreaks.]

bloodwarden's sense.name: Bloodwarden's Sense
bloodwarden's sense.desc: Enemies you attack with a mantra above 60% Blood Poisoning are highlighted briefly.

bloodrend unbounded.name: Bloodrend Unbounded
bloodrend unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your bloodrend to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Bloodrend revokes this Talent.]

hemorrhaging blow.name: Hemorrhaging Blow
hemorrhaging blow.desc: Block breaking your opponent with a blood mantra turns your opponent's combat healing into damage for 8 seconds (55 second CD)

rush hour.name: Rush Hour
rush hour.desc: Stab yourself to become stronger, faster, and deal increased blood bar damage.

adept bloodrender.name: Adept Bloodrender
adept bloodrender.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Bloodrender mantras.

bloodrender.name: Bloodrender
bloodrender.desc: Gain the ability to command Blood as a Bloodrender. Your Bloodrend mantras replenish blood, steal blood, and apply 'Blood Poisoning'.

crimson fountain.name: Crimson Fountain
crimson fountain.desc: Blockbreaking or flourishing an enemy now spills a pool of blood below them.

expert bloodrender.name: Expert Bloodrender
expert bloodrender.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Bloodrender mantras.

first blood.name: First Blood
first blood.desc: Your first blood mantra you use in combat has no blood cost.

master bloodrender.name: Master Bloodrender
master bloodrender.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Bloodrender mantras. Your maximum blood capacity is 25% more than a normal individual. You regen blood at a quicker pace.

sheltering grasp.name: Sheltering Grasp
sheltering grasp.desc: Blood mantras cast within blood pools have a reduced blood cost.

sanguine siphon.name: Sanguine Siphon
sanguine siphon.desc: Landing a critical attack while in a blood pool will consume that pool and empower your next blood mantra.

blood and iron.name: Blood and Iron
blood and iron.desc: Pulling rods out of your opponent now replenishes an equivalent amount of blood.

brain death.name: Brain Death
brain death.desc: Enemies that are already suffocated will have their suffocation extended when hit by a Bloodrend mantra.

cold blooded.name: Cold Blooded
cold blooded.desc: Chilled enemies passively build up blood poision, alternatively when crystals explode it'll apply blood poison. (DOES NOT STACK)

electrolyte.name: Electrolyte
electrolyte.desc: Hitting Bloodrend mantras while having temporary health applies electrify while removing a portion of temporary health.

malevolent sapper.name: Malevolent Sapper
malevolent sapper.desc: The more blood poisoning your opponent has, the more ether your shadow mantras steal from your opponent.

scorchblood.name: Scorchblood
scorchblood.desc: Guardbreaking your opponent with a bloodrend mantra causes a blood explosion, setting your opponent on fire and poisoning their blood.

bruiser's mixup.name: Bruiser's Mixup
bruiser's mixup.desc: Switching your fight Style mid-fight makes your basic Fist attack inflict bleed temporarily.

heavy fatigue.name: Heavy Fatigue
heavy fatigue.desc: [Greataxe] Hitting an enemy slowed by your Greataxe temporarily reduces how far they can roll.

rending impact.name: Rending Impact
rending impact.desc: [Greataxe] Block breaking an enemy applies an extended knockdown.

brazen blow.name: Brazen Blow
brazen blow.desc: [Greataxe] Attacking an enemy slowed by your Greataxe grants you temporary hyperarmor. 20s CD.

impairing blow.name: Impairing Blow
impairing blow.desc: [Greataxe] Basic attacks will slightly slow your enemy for 2s. Running attacks will slightly slow for 3s. Gain +20% posture damage against enemies with speed boosts

dancing guard.name: Dancing Guard
dancing guard.desc:
Parrying an opponent and then parrying another enemy in quick succession applies slow for up to 7s.
[*Note: 4s to 7s duration between 20 and 55 Fortitude.]

defensive reprisal.name: Defensive Reprisal
defensive reprisal.desc:
Being flourished grants you 10% posture resistance for up to 20s.
[*Note: 12s to 20s duration between 20 and 65 Fortitude.]

down to your level.name: Down to your Level
down to your level.desc:
While you have a speed debuff, your Basic Attacks slow your enemies for up to 5s.
[*Note: 3s to 5s duration between 20 and 60 Fortitude.]

knuckle guard.name: Knuckle Guard
knuckle guard.desc:
Hitting Dazed enemies grants you 10% posture resistance for up to 15s.
[*Note: 10s to 15s duration between 30 and 80 Strength + Fortitude.]

ghost.name: Ghost
ghost.desc:
Dodging a move will briefly make you invisible, ending early if you attack.
[*Note: 0.8s to 1.2s duration between 10 and 40 Agility.]

reqs.from: Swift Rebound, Evasive Expert, Risky Moves

evasive expert.name: Evasive Expert
evasive expert.desc: Your speed boost granted from dodging is increased.

risky moves.name: Risky Moves
risky moves.desc: When you successfully dodge, you'll automatically dodge the next attack.

swift rebound.name: Swift Rebound
swift rebound.desc: Move faster after successfully dodging an attack.

oath: chainwarden.name: Oath: Chainwarden
oath: chainwarden.desc: You vow to be the chain that binds the wicked and drags them back where they belong. There are those in this world who should not be free.

reqs.from: Positive reputation with The Central Authority

chainlash.name: Chainlash
chainlash.desc: On flourish, whip your chain to seize and yank enemies towards you, setting them up for a crushing kick.

perpetual wrath.name: Perpetual Wrath
perpetual wrath.desc: Unleash the true power of Restrain. Each successive hit will increase its damage.

champion's regalia.name: Champion's Regalia
champion's regalia.desc: Flourishing an opponent grants you 1.5x posture damage for 10 seconds.

defiance.name: Defiance
defiance.desc: Negative status effects are half as effective when you are below 35% HP.

underdog.name: Underdog
underdog.desc: You deal 2.5% more damage to those with higher HP than you, scaling up to 4% at 60 WLL. Additionally, you deal +10% more damage to physically larger foes.

dazing finisher.name: Dazing Finisher
dazing finisher.desc:
Flourishing enemies that are charmed by you causes them to not be knocked back and be dazed instead.
[*This talent loses some effect below its investment cost.]

reqs.from: Charismatic Cast, Tough Love, Chaotic Charm, Lasting Charisma

charismatic cast.name: Charismatic Cast
charismatic cast.desc: Landing a hit with a mantra on an enemy applies Charmed, reducing their damage done to you. Allies recover from being knocked twice as quickly when charmed by you.

chaotic charm.name: Chaotic Charm
chaotic charm.desc:
Charm enemies nearby when attacked at low health. Enemies affected by this charm have their damage increased to anyone but you, and deal reduce damage towards you.
[*This Talent scales on your Charisma investment.]

lasting charisma.name: Lasting Charisma
lasting charisma.desc:
Enemies charmed by your mantras are charmed for longer.
[*Scales by -0.275 seconds per Charisma invested point between 10s-15s.

tough love.name: Tough Love
tough love.desc: Deal 10% more damage to enemies charmed by you. Mantras deal 5% instead. Being hit by someone the same Aspect or Oath as you charms them briefly.

christmas miracle.name: Christmas Miracle
christmas miracle.desc: Christmas Mod Shop rewards. Regens hunger and thirst. "Thank you so much K1!" Heh, no problem guys. All in a day's work.

freezing wight.name: Freezing Wight
freezing wight.desc: Your Haunted Gale now procs Chilled.

destructive recovery.name: Destructive Recovery
destructive recovery.desc: [Greatsword] Enemies recover 20% less Posture when parrying.

unstoppable force.name: Unstoppable Force
unstoppable force.desc: [Greathammer] You take 15% less posture damage when parried.

heavy hitter.name: Heavy Hitter
heavy hitter.desc: [Heavy Weapons] Your Basic Attack posture damage is increased by 10%.

grand support.name: Grand Support
grand support.desc: Everyone you buff with Reinforce is healed lightly. You're healed slightly if you heal others.

lord's tithe.name: Lord's Tithe
lord's tithe.desc: Everyone you Reinforce is drained of their Ether while Reinforced. Drain scales with your Shadowcast.

oath: contractor.name: Oath: Contractor
oath: contractor.desc: Your heart is forever now eternally tied to Zi'eer, the 4th Prophet of the Ministry. You swear to serve under his will, no matter the cost.

hidden tendril.name: Hidden Tendril
hidden tendril.desc: Landing any physical mantra or critical places a hidden tendril on the opponent.

string trick.name: String Trick
string trick.desc: Pulls together any two opponents you've attached Hidden Tendrils to.

pressure detonation.name: Pressure Detonation
pressure detonation.desc: Block breaking an opponent with a Shadow mantra generates a small vacuum that suffocates those hit and steals their Tempo.

thank you.name: Thank You
thank you.desc: Thanks for using Deepwoken Builder!  This project takes an awful lot of time and effort, so please don't forget to support Cyfer if you can.

reqs.from: Please note that this is not actually a talent.

knife's journey.name: Knife's Journey
knife's journey.desc: Cancelling an enemy's Mantra windup with your basic attack now deals 15% more damage.

decisive blow.name: Decisive Blow
decisive blow.desc: Hitting an enemy with your Critical Attack immediately after they dodge now procs Knife's Journey. Your Knife's Journey procs do 2x Armor damage.

finishing touch.name: Finishing Touch
finishing touch.desc: [Daggers] Instantly execute enemies finished with the critical attack of your dagger.

successive throw.name: Successive Throw
successive throw.desc: [Dagger] When you successfully flourish an enemy, you throw out a dagger afterwards.

chilling flourish.name: Chilling Flourish
chilling flourish.desc: When flourishing an enemy, they leave behind a trail of ice in the direction you send them.

condensation drip.name: Condensation Drip
condensation drip.desc: Passively collect condensation from the air, greatly reducing your thirst.

cool head.name: Cool Head
cool head.desc: If set on fire while on ice, immediately put it out and gain the Cool Head status for 30s. During Cool Head, you cannot be lit on fire. 15s cooldown.

fragile freeze.name: Fragile Freeze
fragile freeze.desc: Your Light Attacks and Critical will now freeze chilled opponents on guardbreak.

spike traps.name: Spike Traps
spike traps.desc: Press [F] during the wind up of your Ice Spikes to create traps around you instead of spawning a spike in the normal spot.

preceding chill.name: Preceding Chill
preceding chill.desc: Enemies hit during the last moments of your ice beam are frozen.

blood thirsty.name: Blood Thirsty
blood thirsty.desc: Gain a speed boost after causing an opponent heavy blood loss.

in a hurry.name: In a Hurry
in a hurry.desc: Grip players faster whenever you have a speed boost active.

muffled screams.name: Muffled Screams
muffled screams.desc: You quieten the cries of help of those you execute, reducing the distance at which their allies will hear it and come to assist, and reduce the effectiveness of talents that slow your execution.

dark rift.name: Dark Rift
dark rift.desc: Enter a rifted state when you sucessfully dodge, where you can't be damaged until its duration ends. Can be cancelled early if you attack.

blighted song.name: Blighted Song
blighted song.desc: Attaching your Shadow Chains to enemies disables both your and your enemy's ability to cast mantras. You take reduced damage from non-chained enemies while this is applied.

dark god.name: Dark God
dark god.desc: If a Shadowcast mantra would drain your opponent's Ether to 0, drain from their Tempo instead and increase your Tempo. Shadowcast mantras will now raise your tempo if your ether is full.

dark hours.name: Dark Hours
dark hours.desc: Your Shadowcast Mantras deal 15% more damage at night and in realms the Sun does not reach.

dark replenishment.name: Dark Replenishment
dark replenishment.desc: Knocking out an enemy in combat restores a portion of your ether.

dark synergy.name: Dark Synergy
dark synergy.desc: Engulf your enemy in shadows when flourishing them.

overwhelming drain.name: Overwhelming Drain
overwhelming drain.desc: If multiple enemies are hit by your Shadow Eruption, they are dazed.

shadow overflow.name: Shadow Overflow
shadow overflow.desc: Extra ether stolen with mantras are exerted as dark energy, damaging and absorbing ether from those nearby.

oath: dawnwalker.name: Oath: Dawnwalker
oath: dawnwalker.desc: You vow to forever reach towards the brilliant Light. There is no shadow that your radiance cannot expunge.

absolute radiance.name: Absolute Radiance
absolute radiance.desc: Dealing damage with Dawnwalker mantras briefly makes you immune to all elemental status effects for a short duration.

luminous flash.name: Luminous Flash
luminous flash.desc: After dealing a certain amount of damage while in 'Absolute Radiance', gain a chance to empower your strikes with pure light.

protagonist syndrome.name: Protagonist Syndrome
protagonist syndrome.desc: The grasp of shadow is meaningless in the face of your blinding light. Your Dawnwalker mantras are empowered after being hit by Shadowcast.

blackhole.name: Blackhole
blackhole.desc: Your singularity pulls everyone nearby in.

energy siphon.name: Energy Siphon
energy siphon.desc: Your singularity now pulls ether from the extra players affected by Blackhole.

depths connection.name: Depths Connection
depths connection.desc: Your interaction with The Depths allows you to easily draw ether from the surrounding air.

reqs.from: Escape the First Layer of the Depths

spell shout.name: Spell Shout
spell shout.desc: You now will shout the names of your spells upon cast.

reqs.from: Pay 50 Notes to the Spell Shout NPC in Isle of Vigils

frozen web.name: Frozen Web
frozen web.desc: Landing a critical with a Static Link on your opponent applies Chilled.

ethiron's gaze.name: Ethiron's Gaze
ethiron's gaze.desc: Your eyes have been opened to the wasteland. You can now see through the harsh fog of the storm of the Eternal Gale more clearly now.

reqs.from: Complete Firfire's Spear of Nakti Quest

concussion.name: Concussion
concussion.desc: Enemies you flourish into walls have their vision altered for a short duration and are dazed longer than usual.

spine cutter.name: Spine Cutter
spine cutter.desc: Hitting an enemy in the back after a roll cancel will initiate a second slash that deals your weapon's raw damage.

strong stern.name: Strong Stern
strong stern.desc: The duration you are dazed from wall bangs is cut in half.

tap dancer.name: Tap Dancer
tap dancer.desc: Rolling immediately after a roll-cancel no longer puts your roll on a longer cooldown.

concussive force.name: Concussive Force
concussive force.desc: Enemies you knocked remain downed longer than usual.

precise swing.name: Precise Swing
precise swing.desc: After landing a critical your next basic attack will have +25% chip damage.

steady nerves.name: Steady Nerves
steady nerves.desc: You dance from toe to toe - successful dodges restore posture.

strong hold.name: Strong Hold
strong hold.desc: [Medium Weapons] When above 33% health and two-handling, posture damage taken is reduced by 5%.

concussive flash.name: Concussive Flash
concussive flash.desc: Your blinding light now concusses foes.

ether overdrive [flm].name: Ether Overdrive [FLM]
ether overdrive [flm].desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether overdrive [ice].name: Ether Overdrive [ICE]
ether overdrive [ice].desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether overdrive [ltn].name: Ether Overdrive [LTN]
ether overdrive [ltn].desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether overdrive [wnd].name: Ether Overdrive [WND]
ether overdrive [wnd].desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether overdrive [sdw].name: Ether Overdrive [SDW]
ether overdrive [sdw].desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether overdrive [mtl].name: Ether Overdrive [MTL]
ether overdrive [mtl].desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether overdrive [bld].name: Ether Overdrive [BLD]
ether overdrive [bld].desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

nullifying clarity.name: Nullifying Clarity
nullifying clarity.desc: Deal 10% more damage to enemies with status effects on them with your basic attacks but the effect is removed on impact.

charged return.name: Charged Return
charged return.desc: Being under an elemental status effect causes your Basic Attacks and critical attacks to do 10% more damage.

cornered fool.name: Cornered Fool
cornered fool.desc:
Blockbreaking a Charmed opponent procs Taunt for a scaled duration, making them take and deal more damage. 15s CD.
[*Note: 3 seconds at 0 Charisma, 6 seconds at 85 Charisma.]

give and take.name: Give and Take
give and take.desc:
Deal less damage to comrades and receive less damage from comrades.
[*Note: 20% less damage to and from allies.]

off your game.name: Off Your Game
off your game.desc: You now slow Taunted enemies when you hit them.

robber baron.name: Robber Baron
robber baron.desc: You hold onto more of your items when defeated.

mantra permanence.name: Mantra Permanence
mantra permanence.desc: Knocking an enemy with a mantra refunds the cost of the mantra.

eureka.name: Eureka
eureka.desc: Gain a stack of Inspiration every time you land or parry a Mantra. Whiffing a Mantra removes a stack of inspiration. Reaching 3 stacks grants +10% Mantra Damage to your next Mantra attack

ether absorption.name: Ether Absorption
ether absorption.desc: Receive Ether back when inflicted with damage from Mantras.

behind you.name: Behind You
behind you.desc: Landing a basic attack behind your enemy after feinting a mantra will apply an ether slash, dealing extra damage based on how much ether you have left.

keen recovery.name: Keen Recovery
keen recovery.desc: Landing a basic attack after feinting a mantra will restore the feinted mantra's ether cost.

reverse leech.name: Reverse Leech
reverse leech.desc: Anytime you proc Behind You, steal ether from your opponent too.

oath: fadetrimmer.name: Oath: Fadetrimmer
oath: fadetrimmer.desc: You vow to forever hone your precision with the scissors. There will never be another fringe incident again.

reqs.from: Change hairstyle 12 times at the Barber

barber's skillset.name: Barber's Skillset
barber's skillset.desc: What type of look are we going for today?

hair products.name: Hair Products
hair products.desc: Select Hair Products to apply to others with your Hair Spray.

meteor impact.name: Meteor Impact
meteor impact.desc: Aerial moves will follow up into a devastating slam.

phoenix impact.name: Phoenix Impact
phoenix impact.desc: If you Meteor Slam an opponent while you're on Fire, restore some HP and Ether.

ferryman's curse.name: Ferryman's Curse
ferryman's curse.desc: You have a 20% chance to convert incoming elemental damage into Lightning damage.

fishman.name: Fishman
fishman.desc: You can execute enemies in water. Gain additional healing from knocking others in water.

graceful steps.name: Graceful Steps
graceful steps.desc: Your dancing steps now gives a faster speed boost.

the final act.name: The Final Act
the final act.desc: Landing a fire mantra immediately after flourishing an opponent will cause them to explode.

dancing steps.name: Dancing Steps
dancing steps.desc: Fire mantras now move you in the direction you're facing.

warding radiance.name: Warding Radiance
warding radiance.desc: Every fire mantra builds up one halo stack. At 3 stacks a halo appears that allows you to slide further. Hell's Partisan is also triggered passively while this is active.

cauterized wounds.name: Cauterized Wounds
cauterized wounds.desc: Blood loss from all sources is lowered.

flamewalker.name: Flamewalker
flamewalker.desc: When Warding Radiance is active you leave trails of flame when you slide.

hell's partisan [warding].name: Hell's Partisan [WARDING]
hell's partisan [warding].desc: After landing a flame dagger on an opponent, your next hit against them will impale with a divine spear from above.

hell's partisan [fire forge].name: Hell's Partisan [FIRE FORGE]
hell's partisan [fire forge].desc: After landing a flame dagger on an opponent, your next hit against them will impale with a divine spear from above.

flamecharm unbounded.name: Flamecharm Unbounded
flamecharm unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your flamecharm to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Flamecharm revokes this Talent.]

azure flames.name: Azure Flames
azure flames.desc: Many of your flames turn blue, signifying their increased intensity.

produce spark.name: Produce Spark
produce spark.desc: A simple production of flame for the use of making campfires.

unyielding inferno.name: Unyielding Inferno
unyielding inferno.desc: Your flames burn just as strong even in the fiercest of storms.

flamecharmer.name: Flamecharmer
flamecharmer.desc: Grants you the ability to command Fire as a Flamecharmer.

adept flamecharmer.name: Adept Flamecharmer
adept flamecharmer.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Flamecharmer Mantras.

expert flamecharmer.name: Expert Flamecharmer
expert flamecharmer.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Flamecharmer Mantras.

master flamecharmer.name: Master Flamecharmer
master flamecharmer.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Flamecharmer mantras.

intrepid flame.name: Intrepid Flame
intrepid flame.desc: Flames wear off twice as fast on you.

temperature shock.name: Temperature Shock
temperature shock.desc: Your fire mantras now detonate any stacked crystals.

agility unbounded.name: Agility Unbounded
agility unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your agility to its fullest.

reqs.from: Talk to the Windrunner at Etris Wilds

hunter's reflexes.name: Hunter's Reflexes
hunter's reflexes.desc: You have a slightly larger dodge window.

exoskeleton.name: Exoskeleton
exoskeleton.desc:
You have a layer of fortified Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest. Your Natural Armor will resist 10% of Physical Damage while active.
[*Note: +5%-+10% between 0 and 40 Fortitude.]

to the finish.name: To The Finish
to the finish.desc:
You take up to 10% less damage when below 30% health.
[*Note: -5%-10% between 20 and 50 Fortitude.]

glacial mobility.name: Glacial Mobility
glacial mobility.desc: Cast Ice Blade while slide-jumping to perform a special running attack.

glacial finish.name: Glacial Finish
glacial finish.desc: Press [F] while using your Ice Smash Mantra to follow up with a devastating attack.

frostdraw unbounded.name: Frostdraw Unbounded
frostdraw unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your frostdraw to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Frostdraw revokes this Talent.]

cold front.name: Cold Front
cold front.desc: Your Vent is imbued with glacial frost.

frostdrawer.name: Frostdrawer
frostdrawer.desc: Grants you the ability to command Ice as a Frostdrawer.

adept frostdrawer.name: Adept Frostdrawer
adept frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Frostdrawer mantras.

expert frostdrawer.name: Expert Frostdrawer
expert frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Frostdrawer mantras.

master frostdrawer.name: Master Frostdrawer
master frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Frostdrawer mantras.

glacial coasting.name: Glacial Coasting
glacial coasting.desc: Sliding while Orbital Ice is active leaves trails of ice.

orbital ice.name: Orbital Ice
orbital ice.desc: When landing a parry while standing on ice, automatically form a ring of ice that grants 15% Physical Resistance. The ring will break after sustaining a certain amount of damage, scaling with your Frostdraw.

fulgurite formation.name: Fulgurite Formation
fulgurite formation.desc: When your Crystals explode, lightning strikes. When your Surge charges Overload on an enemy, your Crystals apply twice on them for 8s.

reqs.from: Glass Path: Crystallization, Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor

frozen legs.name: Frozen Legs
frozen legs.desc: Your slow effect prevents opponents from rolling.

tempest wind.name: Tempest Wind
tempest wind.desc: Cast Wind Blade while sliding to unleash a quick whirlwind attack.

legion kata.name: Legion Kata
legion kata.desc: Gain the ability to use the Legion's martial arts.

reqs.from: Talk to Amara in Lower Erisia with good Legion rep

imperium kata.name: Imperium Kata
imperium kata.desc: Wield an advanced form of the Legion's martial arts.

galebreathe unbounded.name: Galebreathe Unbounded
galebreathe unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your galebreathe to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Galebreathe revokes this Talent.]

galebreather.name: Galebreather
galebreather.desc: Grants you the ability to command Wind as a Galebreather

adept galebreather.name: Adept Galebreather
adept galebreather.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Galebreather mantras.

expert galebreather.name: Expert Galebreather
expert galebreather.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Galebreather mantras.

master galebreather.name: Master Galebreather
master galebreather.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Galebreather mantras.

after cut.name: After Cut
after cut.desc: If an attack is physical and wind it will apply an after cut that does 10% of the damage you dealt. If the attack was a mantra, it does 5% damage instead.

breathing impact.name: Breathing Impact
breathing impact.desc: Knocking enemies into objects with wind spells deals additional blunt damage based on how hard they're hit.

inhale.name: Inhale
inhale.desc: Cancelling a wind spell stores its power in your lungs for 5 seconds, empowering the next wind spell cast in that time. All relevant modifications and upgrades from the inhaled wind mantra are applied to the empowered mantra. Inhaling a spell will cause the wind to be applied to your Basic Attacks.

neuroplasticity.name: Neuroplasticity
neuroplasticity.desc: Your mind is a pliable, flexible substance. The Ether cost of additional modifications to your Mantra is now reduced by 20%.

crystal shrapnel.name: Crystal Shrapnel
crystal shrapnel.desc: Your Crystal explosions now have an AoE that applies crystals to all hit.

glass path: crystallization.name: Glass Path: Crystallization
glass path: crystallization.desc: Your Ice abilities no longer grant a slow effect or the ability to freeze and instead cause ice crystals to grow on your opponent.

reclaimed glass.name: Reclaimed Glass
reclaimed glass.desc: Your crystal shrapnel explosions now grant you and any allies caught in them for 10% Elemental Resistance for 10s.

legendary.name: Legendary
legendary.desc: Parrying and landing hits with your weapon gives you ether back.

fortitude unbounded.name: Fortitude Unbounded
fortitude unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your fortitude to its fullest.

reqs.from: Talk to Brutus in Fort Merit

armor piercing [lht].name: Armor Piercing [LHT]
armor piercing [lht].desc: [Guns] Your gun attacks now ignore 10% of an opponent's physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

reqs.from: Summer Isle Inn Quest; Summer Company; Either 30 Medium Wep. OR 30 Light Wep.

armor piercing [med].name: Armor Piercing [MED]
armor piercing [med].desc: [Guns] Your gun attacks now ignore 10% of an opponent's physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

reqs.from: Summer Isle Inn Quest; Summer Company; Either 30 Medium Wep. OR 30 Light Wep.

hip shooter [hvy].name: Hip Shooter [HVY]
hip shooter [hvy].desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

hip shooter [med].name: Hip Shooter [MED]
hip shooter [med].desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

true ether bullets [lht].name: True Ether Bullets [LHT]
true ether bullets [lht].desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

true ether bullets [med].name: True Ether Bullets [MED]
true ether bullets [med].desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

bulletproof [ftd].name: Bulletproof [FTD]
bulletproof [ftd].desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

reqs.from: Summer Isle Inn Quest; Helping Alsius

bulletproof [lht].name: Bulletproof [LHT]
bulletproof [lht].desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

reqs.from: Summer Isle Inn Quest; Helping Alsius

bulletproof [med].name: Bulletproof [MED]
bulletproof [med].desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

reqs.from: Summer Isle Inn Quest; Helping Alsius

quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
quickdraw.desc: Allows you to fire your offhand gun right after swinging. [Not necessary on dual guns]

parting gift.name: Parting Gift
parting gift.desc: After you land a flourish, gain the ability to shoot bullets for 5 seconds. [Dual Gun]

prime ether bullets.name: Prime Ether Bullets
prime ether bullets.desc: Your bullets take one less hit to proc elemental effects and now have slight intelligence scaling.

brain rattler.name: Brain Rattler
brain rattler.desc: [Clubs] Guardbreaking an opponent with your Critical rattles their brain in its container, causing increased blood loss and blurring their vision.

dispatch.name: Dispatch
dispatch.desc: [Clubs] Bear Trapped targets deal 20% less posture. Dazed targets deal 20% less posture. This can stack.

hammerfall.name: Hammerfall
hammerfall.desc: [Clubs] Aerial attacks do 25% more posture damage when blocked.

fan the flames.name: Fan the Flames
fan the flames.desc:
Your stored Wind mantras can now empower your Fire mantras.
[Note: Some Flamecharm Mantras negatively scale with size! Looking at you, Fire Eruption.]

all above, gods below.name: All Above, Gods Below
all above, gods below.desc: Any healing your opponent were to receive while All the Dead Gods is active on them is stolen and given to you.

all the dead gods.name: All the Dead Gods
all the dead gods.desc:
Your Basic Attacks now apply anti-heal for 8s.
[Note: Scales with investment. Having less Willpower reduces the effect of this Talent.]

heretic's sutra.name: Heretic's Sutra
heretic's sutra.desc:
A chant that steers you into the state of insanity for 20 seconds.
[*Note: Procs Piercing Will for 15 seconds.]
[*Note: 0.4s to 0.1s wind-up and 24s to 18s cooldown between 30 and 100 Willpower.]

reqs.from: Go Tier 1 insanity; talk to Kasen in the Ethironal Shrine Sanctuary

sin stacker.name: Sin Stacker
sin stacker.desc: Your All the Dead Gods' duration is now based on how many stacks of antiheal you already have on your opponent.

brick wall.name: Brick Wall
brick wall.desc:
You refuse. You cannot be knocked off your feet until you are knocked completely unconscious. You are also now knocked down for less time.
[*Note: Knockdown reduction scales with your Fortitude and Willpower.]

not a scratch.name: Not A Scratch
not a scratch.desc: You don't show any signs of damage.

mythic stability.name: Mythic Stability
mythic stability.desc: Players and regular mobs cannot instantly execute you while you're on your feet. Protects you from one instance of instant execution while knocked. 60s CD.

peripheral vision.name: Peripheral Vision
peripheral vision.desc: Your glare now ignores if your opponent is facing you.

unyielding frost.name: Unyielding Frost
unyielding frost.desc: Your Chill can proc through block, with blocked Chilling proc lasting 80% of the duration.

frozen pin-cushion.name: Frozen Pin-Cushion
frozen pin-cushion.desc: Hitting an opponent with your Ice Daggers causes them to freeze.

saint jay.name: Saint Jay
saint jay.desc: When a Chilled enemy receives a heal, it's nullified and 60% of the healing is redirected to you. While this is active and they are on ice your rate of healing is increased.

bottom freeze.name: Bottom Freeze
bottom freeze.desc: Hitting chilled enemies with ice projectiles while they are on ice freezes them to the ground.

cryonis.name: Cryonis
cryonis.desc: All ice spells casted on top of ice cost less Ether.

frost buster.name: Frost Buster
frost buster.desc: Greatsword and Greathammer criticals now place Ice underneath the path they carve.

frostbite.name: Frostbite
frostbite.desc: Enemies can no longer heal when under the effect of your chill.

union pager.name: Union Pager
union pager.desc: Check up on job listings remotely.

force your way.name: Force Your Way
force your way.desc: You can parry uparryable attacks from giant monsters, at the cost of armor durability.

union hook.name: Union Hook
union hook.desc: You can now make use of the Ignition Union hooks to ascend or descend.

reqs.from: Talk to Alpha in the Frontier Furnace after powering the generator.

phoenix flames.name: Phoenix Flames
phoenix flames.desc:
Any time you would burn to death, you instead rise again with up to 50% of your health restored. Has a 60 second cooldown.
[*The health returned with this talent scales on your Flamecharm investment, starting at 25%.]

agitating spark.name: Agitating Spark
agitating spark.desc: Setting enemies on fire spreads to anyone nearby. Including yourself.

immolation.name: Immolation
immolation.desc: Fire spells cost 70% less while on fire. If you hit someone while on fire, apply fire damage. You take 50% less damage from self-inflicted flames.

corpse explosion.name: Corpse Explosion
corpse explosion.desc: Bodies that burn to death immediately explode dealing massive damage. Your fires will incinerate unconscious targets much faster.

pleeksty's faith.name: Pleeksty's Faith
pleeksty's faith.desc: When on fire, automatically quench flames at the cost of some ether.

chitin.name: Chitin
chitin.desc: You have a layer of Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest.

deepbound contract.name: Deepbound Contract
deepbound contract.desc: You progress much faster in the Depths, and slower on the overworld. You can regain sanity at Castle Light, but will always face the strongest foes in your Trial.

deepfolk.name: Deepfolk
deepfolk.desc: The secrets of the Deep are easier for you to unravel. Your mind is sturdier against its effects

echolocator.name: Echolocator
echolocator.desc: Your highly tuned hearing helps you navigate, seeing better in the dark and sensing potential threats.

feathered glider.name: Feathered Glider
feathered glider.desc: As a show of independance when they come of age, Tirans will strike out on their own with just their hand-crafted glider, gliding down from the mountains peaks where they make their homes. You take 10% less fall damage.

loyalty.name: Loyalty
loyalty.desc: Your bond with your allies is strong enough to reduce damage between you

mark of jurik.name: Mark of Jurik
mark of jurik.desc: Buffs the sanity of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire

mark of ku.name: Mark of Ku
mark of ku.desc: Buffs the rest of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire

mark of nemit.name: Mark of Nemit
mark of nemit.desc: Buffs the food of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire

maudet.name: Maudet
maudet.desc: Your understanding of your destiny is such that learning new things often comes naturally to you. People appreciate your diplomatic ways of speaking

molt.name: Molt
molt.desc: Ailments and blessings alike fade away more quickly

mothwing dust.name: Mothwing Dust
mothwing dust.desc: You release Mothwing Dust when others are the first to strike, granting you vision of your attacker. Your antennae improve your peripheral senses, narrowing the angle at which you can be backstabbed.

navae's guidance.name: Navae's Guidance
navae's guidance.desc: Navae's star guides your path, showing you the way forward. Right-clicking on maps sets a Waymarker which can be followed. You are less prone to starvation.

nightchild.name: Nightchild
nightchild.desc: Relying on your instincts, you are naturally more stealthy. You are more nimble on wooden surfaces

seaborne.name: Seaborne
seaborne.desc: You have a keen understanding of ships and their maintenance.

versatile.name: Versatile
versatile.desc: You learn how to use new pieces of equipment quicker than others. You can equip things at 3 points lower than the requirement

voidwalker contract.name: Voidwalker Contract
voidwalker contract.desc: You progress much faster from completing bounties, and less from events. Gain access to the Voidheart, and factions have a negative outlook on you.

union card.name: Union Card
union card.desc: A card representing your membership in the Ignition Union. Entitles you to speedier experience gain from Dungeons and Jobs, though the fees slightly reduce your experience gain outside of these.

willpower unbounded.name: Willpower Unbounded
willpower unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your willpower to its fullest.

reqs.from: Speak to Akira in Castle Light

ironsing unbounded.name: Ironsing Unbounded
ironsing unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your ironsing to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Ironsing revokes this Talent.]

alloyblood.name: Alloyblood
alloyblood.desc:
You  don't bleed like others do. Bleed damage is reduced by 30%. Blood loss is reduced by 75%.
[Note: Scales with investment. Having less Ironsing reduces the effect of this Talent.]

heavy shoulders.name: Heavy Shoulders
heavy shoulders.desc: If your opponent has 3 or more rods, their dodges are slower.

laced traps.name: Laced Traps
laced traps.desc: People hit by your 'Caltrops' cannot jump and are slowed for a small duration.

metal shackles.name: Metal Shackles
metal shackles.desc: Guardbreaking an opponent prevents them from receiving speed boosts for 5 seconds.

oh the irony.name: Oh The Irony
oh the irony.desc: Opponents affected by 'Taunt' receive double iron rods for the duration.

piercing metal.name: Piercing Metal
piercing metal.desc: Deal additional armor damage to enemies per metal rod affecting them

thornmail.name: Thornmail
thornmail.desc: Getting flourished applies a metal rod to the attacker.

ironsinger.name: Ironsinger
ironsinger.desc: Grants you the ability to command Metal as an Ironsinger. Press X to pull on Metal Rods.

adept ironsinger.name: Adept Ironsinger
adept ironsinger.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Ironsinger mantras.

expert ironsinger.name: Expert Ironsinger
expert ironsinger.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Ironsinger mantras.

master ironsinger.name: Master Ironsinger
master ironsinger.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Ironsinger mantras.

ironclad punishment.name: Ironclad Punishment
ironclad punishment.desc: Your Ironsing mantras deal more posture damage to enemies the more armor durability they have.

serpent's dance.name: Serpent's Dance
serpent's dance.desc: Unleash the power of Fang and Coil and unlock a devastating Running Critical Attack,, feint to cancel momentum.

grand skewer.name: Grand Skewer
grand skewer.desc: Press [F] during the windup of Grand Javelin to activate. Your Grand Javelin now carries opponents through the air.

oath: jetstriker.name: Oath: Jetstriker
oath: jetstriker.desc: You vow to flow with the Song itself, drifting across where the trails may take you. If the song permeates everything, then let it be your conduit, and you its master.
oath: jetstriker.stats: +1 Wildcard Mantra, +1 Mobility Mantra, +8 Passive Agility

acceleration points.name: Acceleration Points
acceleration points.desc: Striking an opponent in the back with mobility mantras or basic attacks now steals and grants additional momentum.

decisive winds.name: Decisive Winds
decisive winds.desc: When damaged below 50% health, gain maximum sprint momentum temporarily, then this ability is put on cooldown.

jetstream pursuit.name: Jetstream Pursuit
jetstream pursuit.desc: Upon a succesful flourish. teleport to the opponent when they stop moving. Receive a significant boost of momentum.

rush of ancients.name: Rush of Ancients
rush of ancients.desc: Dashing at maximum sprint momentum makes you one with the wind itself.

stratos step.name: Stratos Step
stratos step.desc: Holding space while climbing will now let you perform Stratos Steps to get even higher. Others can follow your Stratos Steps.

the path, unveiled.name: The Path, Unveiled
the path, unveiled.desc: Your Jus Karita attacks deal 15% more damage.

jus karita.name: Jus Karita
jus karita.desc: Adopt the kick-based fighting style of the Justicars.

reqs.from: Can also be obtained for 0 LHT during character creation.

justicar's prowess.name: Justicar's Prowess
justicar's prowess.desc: Jus Karita +30% posture damage against other fist styles.

justicar's renewal.name: Justicar's Renewal
justicar's renewal.desc: Hitting an opponent with your Jus Karita critical resets the cooldown. (10s cooldown)

flying swiftkick.name: Flying Swiftkick
flying swiftkick.desc: Hitting a Jus Karita critical attack while Swiftkick Prodigy is active will greatly slow your enemy and consume your speed boost.

swiftkick prodigy.name: Swiftkick Prodigy
swiftkick prodigy.desc: Hitting successive basic attacks with Jus Karita will give you a temporary speed buff.

kickstart [cha].name: Kickstart [CHA]
kickstart [cha].desc: Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield.

kickstart [ftd].name: Kickstart [FTD]
kickstart [ftd].desc: Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield.

blade's edge.name: Blade's Edge
blade's edge.desc: [Spears] Damage dealt with the tip of the spear is increased by 10%.

defensive sweep.name: Defensive Sweep
defensive sweep.desc: [Spears] Posture breaking an opponent grants you +50% PEN for 3 seconds.

driving impact.name: Driving Impact
driving impact.desc: [Spears] The first hit of your Spear's Critical Attack will deal greatly increased posture damage. Subsequent hits will do reduced posture damage.

hoplite.name: Hoplite
hoplite.desc: Posture damage is reduced by 15% when wielding a spear and standing still.

lancer's impale.name: Lancer's Impale
lancer's impale.desc: [Spears] Hitting an enemy after a dodge makes your next attack deal bleed damage. If that attack would already bleed, it adds +10% chip damage instead.

the floor is lava.name: The Floor is Lava
the floor is lava.desc:
Your eruptions leave pools of lava beneath them. Don't fall in.
[*The duration of your pools of lava scales on your Flamecharm investment.]

empowered eruption.name: Empowered Eruption
empowered eruption.desc: Your next Eruption after landing a critical is Empowered with +50% range and damage. 10s cooldown.

flash point.name: Flash Point
flash point.desc: Block breaking an opponent causes your Eruptions to be Empowered for the next 10s. 45s CD. Block breaking an opponent with a Fire Mantra procs Burning.

eruption path: lava serpent.name: Eruption Path: Lava Serpent
eruption path: lava serpent.desc: Your fire abilities no longer proc burn and instead proc on eruption under the enemies feet.

callout.name: Callout
callout.desc: You can mark objects or enemies by pressing Z, which will mark them for all nearby allies.

spotter.name: Spotter
spotter.desc: Marking enemies while in Rhythm will indicate their health status to your allies.

observation.name: Observation
observation.desc: Dodge frames are larger if you cancel your roll immediately.

safety dance.name: Safety Dance
safety dance.desc: Your base dodge frames are increased by 0.05s.

air pressure.name: Air Pressure
air pressure.desc: Dodging an attack or hitting an enemy's block will transform your next dash into a Gale Dash.

cyclone blade.name: Cyclone Blade
cyclone blade.desc: After a successful Gale Dash you wrap your weapon in wind essence causing your next Light attack to do bleed damage, and adding +10% chip damage.

pressure break [agl].name: Pressure Break [AGL]
pressure break [agl].desc: Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them to take intense wind pressure, increasing the attack's damage by +25% and flinging the enemy backwards.

reqs.from: Air Pressure, Not additive / either 30 Agility OR 30 Strength

pressure break [str].name: Pressure Break [STR]
pressure break [str].desc: Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them to take intense wind pressure, increasing the attack's damage by +25% and flinging the enemy backwards.

reqs.from: Air Pressure, Not additive / either 30 Agility OR 30 Strength

wind step.name: Wind Step
wind step.desc: Create a step of wind below you when jumping in the air. Jumping while sliding down a slope or off a cliff launches you forwards. (5s combat CD, 1s normal CD)

centurion's resolve.name: Centurion's Resolve
centurion's resolve.desc: Your Legion Kata attacks deal 10% more damage.

savior.name: Savior
savior.desc: After saving a player from being gripped gain a short speed boost for a short duration.

scorched peak.name: Scorched Peak
scorched peak.desc: Blockbreaking an enemy on fire or with a fire mantra causes them to be struck by lightning.

comeback kid.name: Comeback Kid
comeback kid.desc: When waking up from being knocked you are unable to be knocked down for 5 seconds. (120 second cooldown)

defiant until the end.name: Defiant until the End
defiant until the end.desc: Slow the enemy trying to execute you down with one last shout of your determination

last resort.name: Last Resort
last resort.desc: Deal +10% more damage when your health is significantly low.

the eleventh hour.name: The Eleventh Hour
the eleventh hour.desc: When below 15% health your mantras require no ether to cast for 11 seconds. 60s CD

oath: linkstrider.name: Oath: Linkstrider
oath: linkstrider.desc: The Entropy Catalyst generated enough force to fundamentally change your state of existence. You now exist between two states, your newfound clarity making the imperceptible Bonds between all souls malleable to you.

entropy link.name: Entropy Link
entropy link.desc: The world is broken, linked by fragile webs. Traverse the path by stating your destination amidst the flame.

symbiotic link.name: Symbiotic Link
symbiotic link.desc: Press X while hovering over an ally to buff them, or while hovering over an opponent to debuff them. The links you create are destroyed when you receive damage from an enemy.

old habits die hard.name: Old Habits Die Hard
old habits die hard.desc: Blocking an attack with your lingering block frames after failing a parry will cause the attack to deal 15% less posture damage.

thresher claws.name: Thresher Claws
thresher claws.desc: All of your attacks have +5% more PEN. Your Basic Attacks and critical attacks have an additional +5% PEN on top.

thresher scales.name: Thresher Scales
thresher scales.desc: You regenerate your armor at campfires.

leg shot.name: Leg Shot
leg shot.desc: [Rifles] Landing a critical slows your enemy for a bit, and disables any speed boosts they get for the next 10 seconds.

stock bash.name: Stock Bash
stock bash.desc: [Rifles] Your running attacks now apply a brief amount of daze.

tactical reload.name: Tactical Reload
tactical reload.desc: [Rifles] Activate to make your rifle shoot bullets for 15 seconds. (90 second CD)

survival kit [cha].name: Survival Kit [CHA]
survival kit [cha].desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

survival kit [int].name: Survival Kit [INT]
survival kit [int].desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

survival kit [wil].name: Survival Kit [WIL]
survival kit [wil].desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

impervious slumber.name: Impervious Slumber
impervious slumber.desc: Getting hit while knocked no longer resets your time knocked.

breathing exercise.name: Breathing Exercise
breathing exercise.desc: Your sanity recovers more quickly once out of terrifying situations.

conquer your fears.name: Conquer your Fears
conquer your fears.desc: Killing the beings of the deep replenishes your Sanity somewhat. When an ally grips an enemy nearby to you, you regain Sanity.

disbelief.name: Disbelief
disbelief.desc: You're resistant to the effects of Illusion magic. You are resistant to charms and tricks.

art of the deal.name: Art of the Deal
art of the deal.desc: Your rapport with merchants gives you lower prices!

intuitive repairs.name: Intuitive Repairs
intuitive repairs.desc: Your "Iron Skin" repairs armor while it's active.

metal absorption.name: Metal Absorption
metal absorption.desc: Your 'Iron Hug' also absorbs armor from the enemy.

metal eater.name: Metal Eater
metal eater.desc: When you have no Ether, consume armor durability to cast your Ironsing mantras.

metal thief.name: Metal Thief
metal thief.desc: Pulling an opponent absorbs a portion of their current Armor durability.

polished armor.name: Polished Armor
polished armor.desc: You receive 5% less damage when your Armor protects you from an attack and has over 90% durability. This 5% will scale up to 10% less damage at 100 MTL.

chain of perfection.name: Chain of Perfection
chain of perfection.desc: You gain stacks of 'Perfection' on hitting mobs with basic attacks. Perfection increases your damage towards mobs the more stack you have. All stacks are lost upon taking damage.

echoing lunatic.name: Echoing Lunatic
echoing lunatic.desc: Your Ardour Scream now applies a bit of insanity.

lose your mind.name: Lose Your Mind
lose your mind.desc:
Deal more damage the more insane you are. Grants 15% damage at maximum insanity.
[Note: Will only proc below 70% sanity, and has diminishing returns.]

piercing will.name: Piercing Will
piercing will.desc: When your sanity is below 35%, gain up to +15% PEN on your attacks. Starting at 5% PEN, the lower your sanity, the higher your PEN.

shared misery.name: Shared Misery
shared misery.desc: Using a Basic Attack/Critical Attack on an enemy while losing sanity causes them to lose sanity.

brassneck.name: Brassneck
brassneck.desc: Knocking an enemy grants you 20% damage resistance for 15 seconds.

blinded.name: Blinded
blinded.desc: Your vision is obscured by something. Somehow, you feel safer. You remember the warmth of your youth.

dragon's song.name: Dragon's Song
dragon's song.desc: Landing a Mantra after an uppercut grants Ether. 2s CD.

full reset.name: Full Reset
full reset.desc: Knocking an enemy resets your resonance cooldowns. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.

gourmand.name: Gourmand
gourmand.desc: Your hunger and thirst gain from eating increased.

heavy haul.name: Heavy Haul
heavy haul.desc: Enemies who carry you move significantly slower.

martyr.name: Martyr
martyr.desc: Enemies gain less health and posture when knocking you.

pack mule.name: Pack Mule
pack mule.desc: The max quantity for food you can hold is increased by 5.

pleeksty's will.name: Pleeksty's Will
pleeksty's will.desc: You gain some Ether from consuming elemental ingredients.

polite awakening.name: Polite Awakening
polite awakening.desc: Recover 15% of your max health after getting up from being downed. (Only Procs when below 20% HP)

ready or not.name: Ready or Not
ready or not.desc: The first attack to hit you while out of combat has its damage cut in half.

replenishing knockout.name: Replenishing Knockout
replenishing knockout.desc: Gain more health and posture from downing enemies.

already dead.name: Already Dead
already dead.desc: You take reduced damage from abilities with a health cost.

brunt.name: Brunt
brunt.desc: While 2-handling, you take less posture damage.

knack.name: Knack
knack.desc: Trees yield more Wood when felled. Your Repair speed is increased.

looter.name: Looter
looter.desc: Gain extra loot from items you turn in for rewards.

mocking favor.name: Mocking Favor
mocking favor.desc: When taunting, Aelita or Tillian appears, bestowing upon you a random boon of affliction (30s cooldown).

reqs.from: Jester's Garb Outfit / Trickster's Habit Outfit

paired soul.name: Paired Soul
paired soul.desc: Wielding a katana with this outfit grants extra damage.

reqs.from: Vigil Initiate Outfit / Cloak of Winds Outfit / Royal Etrean Guard Outfit

scholar's intuition.name: Scholar's Intuition
scholar's intuition.desc: INT, WIL, and CHA Training gear is 50% more effective.

tidekeeper.name: Tidekeeper
tidekeeper.desc: Losing 25% of your health within the span of 3 seconds grants a 15% damage buff, a 20% defence buff, and prevents you from being knocked for 10 seconds.

wind dancer.name: Wind Dancer
wind dancer.desc: Roll cancelling twice in quick succession will grant you a speed boost. One of your rolls must dodge a hit.

withering soul.name: Withering Soul
withering soul.desc: Your Basic Attacks proc 12.5% of their damage as Wither. Wielding the Deepspindle will double the amount to 25%.

static mastery.name: Static Mastery
static mastery.desc: Your static withdraw no longer deals damage nor stuns you.

vigil's grace.name: Vigil's Grace
vigil's grace.desc: Whenever you have a speed boost, increase your swing speed by 0.03.

tempest evolution.name: Tempest Evolution
tempest evolution.desc: If you land a Tempest Wind, you deal 20% more damage in the air for a few seconds. Your Tempest Wind is also naturally stronger.

refreeze.name: Refreeze
refreeze.desc: Landing any sort of ability that causes bottom freeze reduces the cooldown of your Orbital Ice by 5 seconds.

focused hematoma.name: Focused Hematoma
focused hematoma.desc: Decrease outside sources of blood loss by 25% but reduce the amount of temporary health you receive by 15%.

lethal dose.name: Lethal Dose
lethal dose.desc: Doubles the duration of your poison from your hidden blade.

hyperbody.name: Hyperbody
hyperbody.desc: Apply a buff to your allies around you that increases your speed, defense, and regeneration. This effect becomes weaker the more allies you buff.

soul rip.name: Soul Rip
soul rip.desc: Kill a player to gain 2 runes. Activate a rune when using this talent, and gain immense physical power, defense, and infinite Ether for 25 seconds. Beware its strenuous downside.

actions speak louder.name: Actions Speak Louder
actions speak louder.desc: Your critical attack cooldown is 20% shorter. but your Resonance cooldown is double as long. In areas where your Resonance is suppresed. reduces your cooldown by 5% instead

brute strength.name: Brute Strength
brute strength.desc: Your vent is replaced with a ground slam attack that knocks back enemies.

coldseep reactor.name: Coldseep Reactor
coldseep reactor.desc: By cultivating the local chemosynthetic microornganisms within the Depths and utilising them as a power source, your helm thrums with a protective field of static electricity and heat.

diver's resilience.name: Diver's Resilience
diver's resilience.desc: You can parry unparryable attack from giant monsters, but due to the heft of the plate you have slightly reduced speed.

elegy of light.name: Elegy of Light
elegy of light.desc: The Unspoken Vow of the Waking God resonates through you, if briefly. Protects you from the effects of Deep Gems for 3 minutes. Remains dormant until you take the life of an equal.

featherfall.name: Featherfall
featherfall.desc: Prevents Falls from damaging you After sufficient damage has been resisted. the pendant will go inactive and require time to recharge.

immortality.name: Immortality
immortality.desc: The remnants of the helmet's Mind Veil stir into life when you would be knocked, soaking all damage for a brief duration. 30s CD. Viscocity is rejected.

rock blaster.name: Rock Blaster
rock blaster.desc: Doubles your ore yields when mining.

star duster.name: Star Duster
star duster.desc: You take 10% less damage from airborne enemies.

surestep.name: Surestep
surestep.desc: Your boots secure your footing in all forms of terrain by digging into the ground with metal spikes.

temple guard.name: Temple Guard
temple guard.desc: For the first 0.3s of your Critical Attack's windup, you take 90% less damage from any attacks that cancel your windup.

wormwarder.name: Wormwarder
wormwarder.desc: Your lantern generates a shroud of static electricity around you that the flesh-burrowing parasites of the Eternal Gale detest. it's not exactly the lightest thing to lug around, though.

winter's presence.name: Winter's Presence
winter's presence.desc: Your tightly-bound winter gear negates elemental damage buffs from weather on damage against you. Also seems to provide some resistance to the Gale.

treefelling blow.name: Treefelling Blow
treefelling blow.desc: You can collect lumber from the trees you fell with your fists. It's only natural.

reqs.from: Complete the Lumber Axe Quest in Etris

benefactor.name: Benefactor
benefactor.desc: Gain reputation for selling goods to Antiquarians within faction territories.

fleetfoot.name: Fleetfoot
fleetfoot.desc: Gain an initial speed boost when slide jumping.

primal rage.name: Primal Rage
primal rage.desc: If you are below 50%, unleash your rage and increase the amount of damage you deal for 25 seconds as well as being able to see enemy health when you hit them. [3 minute CD]

charisma unbounded.name: Charisma Unbounded
charisma unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your charisma to its fullest.

murmur: ardour.name: Murmur: Ardour
murmur: ardour.desc: An application of the Song that enables one to channel the Murmur into raw strength. Press H.

murmur: rhythm.name: Murmur: Rhythm
murmur: rhythm.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to perceive the subtle Murmur emanating from all things. Press G while crouched.

reqs.from: Complete the Harmonium Quest in the Ethironal Shrine Sanctuary to obtain this Murmur.

murmur: tacet.name: Murmur: Tacet
murmur: tacet.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to suppress their own murmur. Press T while crouched.

reqs.from: Complete the Cestis quest to obtain this Murmur.

ardour scream.name: Ardour Scream
ardour scream.desc: Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. Victims take 25% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10s.

armor conserver.name: Armor Conserver
armor conserver.desc: You lose 15% less armor when hit.

lightweight.name: Lightweight
lightweight.desc: Move faster when your armor runs out of durability.

padded armor.name: Padded Armor
padded armor.desc: While your armor is broken (or if you have no armor), you take 5% less damage.

steel scales.name: Steel Scales
steel scales.desc: You take an additional 5% less damage when your armor is broken.

fists of fortitude.name: Fists of Fortitude
fists of fortitude.desc: [Fists] Every 6 hits with your fist builds of a shield of endurance reducing incoming damage by 15%. 70s CD.

captain etrea.name: Captain Etrea
captain etrea.desc: Moving while with a shield no longer slows you down.

fists of navae.name: Fists of Navae
fists of navae.desc: Your flourish timer lasts longer with fists.

way of navae.name: Way of Navae
way of navae.desc: Gain the ability to use fist combat against weapons. Including the ability to block weapons with your hands using Ether.

reqs.from: Turn in Navaen Nomad Hostage to Nomad Camps

chief's will.name: Chief's Will
chief's will.desc: Your Way of Navae light attacks have 25% additional penetration.

duelist's lunge.name: Duelist's Lunge
duelist's lunge.desc: [Rapier] Running Basic Attacks deal increased posture damage. Upon landing your critical, your next running Basic Attack has increased range.

frenzied dance.name: Frenzied Dance
frenzied dance.desc: [Rapier] When your posture is about to collapse, you deal greater chip and posture damage.

pressure skewer.name: Pressure Skewer
pressure skewer.desc: [Rapier] Flourishing an enemy causes your Basic Attacks to deal additional blood loss until you take damage.

lightspeed reflexes.name: Lightspeed Reflexes
lightspeed reflexes.desc: Feinting gives a brief auto-parry window.

fast blade.name: Fast Blade
fast blade.desc: Increase the speed boost you get from successfully parrying an attack.

speed emission.name: Speed Emission
speed emission.desc: Gain a slight speed boost after landing a vent.

oath: oathless.name: Oath: Oathless
oath: oathless.desc: You vow to never be bound to any oath; to live your life free of restraint. If free will is an illusion, why not make it a convincing one?

all knowing.name: All Knowing
all knowing.desc: Your prediction now ignores the range requirement to reflect attacks.

intelligence unbounded.name: Intelligence Unbounded
intelligence unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your intelligence to its fullest.

successive prediction.name: Successive Prediction
successive prediction.desc: Predicting an attack will briefly allow you to predict another.

twelve steps ahead.name: Twelve Steps Ahead
twelve steps ahead.desc:
Landing Prediction will halve the cooldown to a minimum of 2s. Whiffing will double the cooldown to a maximum of 40s. This effect stacks up for up to 30 seconds.
[*Note: The penalty cooldown scales off of your Intelligence, with 30s at 80 Intelligence.]

strength unbounded.name: Strength Unbounded
strength unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your strength to its fullest.

lock n load.name: Lock n Load
lock n load.desc: [1H Guns] The first bullet in your gun does more damage when fully loaded. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%. After fully reloading, the last bullet in your gun will do more damage. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%.

rapid fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid fire.desc: [1H Guns] When you land a critical shot gain the ability to rapidly fire your critical for 2s. 12s cooldown.

rapid reload.name: Rapid Reload
rapid reload.desc: [1H Guns] You have 20% faster reload when reloading an empty pistol.

sleight of hand.name: Sleight of Hand
sleight of hand.desc: [1H Guns] When you flourish an opponent, you instantly load a bullet.

ultrakill.name: Ultrakill
ultrakill.desc: [1H Guns] When under the effects of Rapid Fire you reload 2x as fast. (Play Ultrakill)

environmentalist.name: Environmentalist
environmentalist.desc: Resist the effects of some weather events.

cult of personality.name: Cult of Personality
cult of personality.desc: You gain +3% PEN per each person Charmed. Capping at +15% PEN.

pardon me.name: Pardon Me
pardon me.desc: Crimes you commit in allied territories are often ignored. Who's asking?

excavator.name: Excavator
excavator.desc: Chance to receive two sets of ore when mining. You mine things more quickly.

reqs.from: Turn in 5 Pure Ores to a Blacksmith

harvester.name: Harvester
harvester.desc: Chance to receive two sets of ingredients when harvesting. You fell trees in fewer strikes.

reqs.from: Complete the Potions Quest in Widow's Cave

celebrity.name: Celebrity
celebrity.desc: Your natural skill in mediating conflict makes people think more highly of you. Your base reputation with factions is higher and your reputation caps out higher.

under the radar.name: Under The Radar
under the radar.desc: The negative reputation threshold for a faction to put up on bounty posters is now higher.

you'll need to get past me.name: You'll Need To Get Past Me
you'll need to get past me.desc:
When you're attacked, one of your many allies will leap into action to protect their boss.
[*Note: 65s CD at 20 Charisma, 55s CD at 100 Charisma.]

going nowhere.name: Going Nowhere
going nowhere.desc: When enemies dodge your attacks, their momentum is killed and they're briefly prevented from sprinting.

volcanic glass.name: Volcanic Glass
volcanic glass.desc: Detonating crystals causes an eruption soon after.

reqs.from: Glass Path: Crystallization, Eruption Path: Lava Serpent

hungry flames.name: Hungry Flames
hungry flames.desc: When you have no Ether, consume Stomach and Water to instantly cast your next fire mantra.

blood transfusion.name: Blood Transfusion
blood transfusion.desc: Successfully landing a critical attack while under a negative status effect will transfer the effect plus recover a small portion of your blood bar. (20 second CD)

blood bag.name: Blood Bag
blood bag.desc: You receive extra blood from knocking an enemy.

just a taste.name: Just a Taste
just a taste.desc: First bloodrend mantra you hit in combat has increased blood drain.

open wound.name: Open Wound
open wound.desc: Guardbreaking enemies leaves enemies more susceptible to blood loss from Bloodrend mantras.

bulldozer.name: Bulldozer
bulldozer.desc: Enemies you flourish into walls have a chance of breaking the wall and are guard broken on impact.

piercing blow.name: Piercing Blow
piercing blow.desc: Attacks that break an opponent's block ignore their Armor resistances.

broken ankles.name: Broken Ankles
broken ankles.desc: Blockbreaking an opponent puts their Mobility slot Mantras on CD for 12s. 30s CD

million ton piercer.name: Million Ton Piercer
million ton piercer.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Strength.]

shield breaker.name: Shield Breaker
shield breaker.desc: Blunt damage now fully ignores the posture bonus from shields.

unwavering resolve.name: Unwavering Resolve
unwavering resolve.desc:
Getting parried punishes your posture up to 33% less.
[*Note: 20% to 33% punishment reduction between 10 and 40 Strength.]

jolting current.name: Jolting Current
jolting current.desc: Your lightning attacks in water strike others near them with lightning.

rending needle: impaler.name: Rending Needle: Impaler
rending needle: impaler.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull instead pulls out all of the rods for massive damage.

rending needle: jailer.name: Rending Needle: Jailer
rending needle: jailer.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will restrain them instead of pulling them.

rending needle: conductor.name: Rending Needle: Conductor
rending needle: conductor.desc: 5 metal rods will combine into a conductor rod. If an enemy uses a non-Ironsing elemental mantra, they're dealt their element back in turn.

rending needle: augmenter [hvy].name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [HVY]
