rending needle: augmenter [hvy].desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.

rending needle: augmenter [med].name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [MED]
rending needle: augmenter [med].desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.
exclusiveWith: Rending Needle: Conductor. Rending Needle: Augmenter [HVY]

rending needle: augmenter [lht].name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [LHT]
rending needle: augmenter [lht].desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.

conductor's cable.name: Conductor's Cable
conductor's cable.desc: Applying Conductor rods on opponents steals some of their armor to you.

explosive efficiency.name: Explosive Efficiency
explosive efficiency.desc: When crafting bombs, you craft double the amount. You have the chance to triple the amount.

hot potato.name: Hot Potato
hot potato.desc: Gain a large boost of speed after throwing a bomb. Your bombs have a chance to detonate twice.

incendiary formula.name: Incendiary Formula
incendiary formula.desc: Bombs will set your enemies on fire upon detonation, as well as launch with more force. Bombs will deal 20% increased damage to burning enemies.

pocket bombs.name: Pocket Bombs
pocket bombs.desc: You have a chance to activate a bomb in your inventory when damaged.

sulphur surprise.name: Sulphur Surprise
sulphur surprise.desc: Your cooldown for throwing bombs will be shortened after your first bomb damages on enemy.

family recipe.name: Family Recipe
family recipe.desc: You can now craft bombs at a crafting bench.

reqs.from: Complete the Mineskipper Quest in Songseeker Wilds

will o' wisp [flm].name: Will o' Wisp [FLM]
will o' wisp [flm].desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will o' wisp [ice].name: Will o' Wisp [ICE]
will o' wisp [ice].desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will o' wisp [ltn].name: Will o' Wisp [LTN]
will o' wisp [ltn].desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will o' wisp [wnd].name: Will o' Wisp [WND]
will o' wisp [wnd].desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will o' wisp [sdw].name: Will o' Wisp [SDW]
will o' wisp [sdw].desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will o' wisp [mtl].name: Will o' Wisp [MTL]
will o' wisp [mtl].desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will o' wisp [bld].name: Will o' Wisp [BLD]
will o' wisp [bld].desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

heavy weapons unbounded.name: Heavy Weapons Unbounded
heavy weapons unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Heavy Weapons attribute to its fullest.

light weapons unbounded.name: Light Weapons Unbounded
light weapons unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Light Weapons attribute to its fullest.

medium weapons unbounded.name: Medium Weapons Unbounded
medium weapons unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Medium Weapons attribute to its fullest.

oath: saintsworn.name: Oath: Saintsworn
oath: saintsworn.desc: A vow to the fallen heroes. Press L to swap to Saintsblade.

reqs.from: Talk to the Attunement Pillars scattered throughout the map.

oath: saintsworn.stats: +2 Combat Mantra Slot, +2 Support Mantra Slot, +1 Wildcard Mantra Slot

ether proselyte.name: Ether Proselyte
ether proselyte.desc: All of your Elemental Mantras below Lv. 5 are 1 Mantra Level higher. Your Mantras are converted to the element of your active stance.

hero's assist.name: Hero's Assist
hero's assist.desc: Heroes come to your aid based on your Saint Stance.

saint's negation.name: Saint's Negation
saint's negation.desc: Once per stance cycle you can fully block an attack that matches your Saint Stance.

saint's overload.name: Saint's Overload
saint's overload.desc: After a full rotation of stances your elemental scaling is increased by 15% and Mantra Modifiers [are] increased by 10%.

saint's synergy.name: Saint's Synergy
saint's synergy.desc: 25% of your highest element scaling is applied to other elemental damage.

oath: saltchemist.name: Oath: Saltchemist
oath: saltchemist.desc: You vow to dedicate body and mind to the furthering of the Material Arts. Your body is a conduit through which true knowledge shall be siphoned. Knowledge is power, and you shall be its vessel.

reqs.from: Brew a potion for Ciea and fufill Adrofalis' demands.

oath: saltchemist.stats: +20 Carry Load, +1 Support Mantra, +1 Wildcard Mantra

antithetic salts.name: Antithetic Salts
antithetic salts.desc: Alter your brews to invert their effects. Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

aromatic salts.name: Aromatic Salts
aromatic salts.desc: Alter your brews to create lingering clouds of mist on shattering . Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

biotic salts.name: Biotic Salts
biotic salts.desc: Alter your brews to have reduced positive effects on your enemies and somewhat reduced negative effects on your allies when thrown. Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

perpetual distillery.name: Perpetual Distillery
perpetual distillery.desc: Your very body has become a distillery for your alchemy. Gain 3 Autobrew slots that will automatically produce 3 concoctions of your choice.

enhanced flow [lht].name: Enhanced Flow [LHT]
enhanced flow [lht].desc: Refine your Rush Hour, allowing you to now also gain temp health whenever you hit a player while using Rush Hour. You now also take less damage from using Rush Hour.

enhanced flow [med].name: Enhanced Flow [MED]
enhanced flow [med].desc: Refine your Rush Hour, allowing you to now also gain temp health whenever you hit a player while using Rush Hour. You now also take less damage from using Rush Hour.

enhanced flow [hvy].name: Enhanced Flow [HVY]
enhanced flow [hvy].desc: Refine your Rush Hour, allowing you to now also gain temp health whenever you hit a player while using Rush Hour. You now also take less damage from using Rush Hour.

dark receiver.name: Dark Receiver
dark receiver.desc: Shadow moves will also steal Ether from those you are Static Linked tethered to.

blood bank.name: Blood Bank
blood bank.desc: Consuming 'Charm' now gives slight temporary health.

donation drive.name: Donation Drive
donation drive.desc:
Consuming 'Charm' on an opponent replenishes some blood. Additionally, you can also activate this effect and Manipulator through blockbreaking with a Bloodrend mantra.
[*Note: 12s to 8s CD between 20 and 60 Charisma.]

sharing is caring.name: Sharing is Caring
sharing is caring.desc: Your 'Charm' on opponents also slightly increases your blood drain against them.

windwaker.name: Windwaker
windwaker.desc: Call upon a gust of wind to propel your boat even faster.

dirty boxing.name: Dirty Boxing
dirty boxing.desc: Enemies hit after you feint them with your fist suffer slight bleed and have their vision obscured slightly. 5s cooldown.

pocket sand.name: Pocket Sand
pocket sand.desc: [Fist] Feinting into an uppercut blinds and dazes your opponents briefly. We're even now, right? 30s cooldown

reshape and remold.name: Reshape and Remold
reshape and remold.desc:
Successful procs of Scrapsinger will increase the amount of armor damage your opponent takes. After hitting 10 stacks, the opponent will take +5% damage until the stacks drop below 10.
[*This talent loses some effectiveness when below its requirements.]

reqs.from: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger, Refine and Reuse, Artisan's Blade, Songs Unforged, Masterwork

masterwork.name: Masterwork
masterwork.desc: Successful hits from Artisan Blades will proc metal rods and deal 50% more damage.

artisan's blade.name: Artisan's Blade
artisan's blade.desc: Activating Scrapsinger forges a metal blade behind you for every 2 rods you consume. Metal blades will fire at a target upon landing an ironsing or metal infused attack.

gilded path: scrapsinger.name: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger
gilded path: scrapsinger.desc: Flourishing an enemy consumes any rods they have and siphones their armor to you per rod.

refine and reuse.name: Refine and Reuse
refine and reuse.desc: Consuming rods with Scrapsinger reduces incoming PEN against you for 14 seconds. Each rod reduces PEN by 5% multiplicatively.

songs unforged.name: Songs Unforged
songs unforged.desc: Your weapon criticals will now activate Scrapsinger

jumpstart.name: Jumpstart
jumpstart.desc: Using Static Withdraw when not being carried applies Jumpstart, increasing your ability to scale walls, your speed and applies shock to all outgoing physical damage and damage taken. Grants a +10% damage multiplier.

raging static.name: Raging Static
raging static.desc: Your Jumpstart no longer gives you movement buffs, but your outgoing physical damage is increased up to 20%. The self damage to activate it is lowered. Your cooldown on Jumpstart is also lowered.

gruesome harvest.name: Gruesome Harvest
gruesome harvest.desc: Landing Bloodrend mantras on opponents with over 70% blood poison will give you slight temporary health.

panacea.name: Panacea
panacea.desc:
Hitting an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra stops their blood poison from decaying briefly.
[*Note: Lasts for 7 seconds.]

hemolysis.name: Hemolysis
hemolysis.desc: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to opponents with over 25% blood poisoning.

hemolytic transfusion.name: Hemolytic Transfusion
hemolytic transfusion.desc: Guardbreaking an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra increases the amount of blood poison from the attack.

juicy snack.name: Juicy Snack
juicy snack.desc: Eliminating enemies returns their amount of blood poision as health to you.

tainted ground.name: Tainted Ground
tainted ground.desc: Enemies who stand in blood pools will not decay blood poison.

vasculitis.name: Vasculitis
vasculitis.desc: Your opponent cannot proc deep gems if they have over 20% blood poisoning for a brief duration. *Must hit them while they are over 20% BP.)

shadowcast unbounded.name: Shadowcast Unbounded
shadowcast unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your shadowcast to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Shadowcast revokes this Talent.]

shadow travel.name: Shadow Travel
shadow travel.desc: Teleport to a location in exchange for Ether cost. Certain ranges will require a health sacrifice. Be careful as this technique can prove lethal to the user.

blossoming darkness.name: Blossoming Darkness
blossoming darkness.desc: Ether drained during Shadow Roar increases the size of it.

fear the dark.name: Fear the Dark
fear the dark.desc: Enemies that run from you after being hit by your shadows will hang in place briefly.

lasting sorrow.name: Lasting Sorrow
lasting sorrow.desc: Shadow lasts longer on your opponent.

sightless still.name: Sightless Still
sightless still.desc: The more a person is affected by your shadowcast the more you obscure their vision. Block breaking an opponent obscures their vision with darkness more potent than your Shadow mantra.

singularity.name: Singularity
singularity.desc: Enemies will briefly hang in place when hit by a shadow move.

shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
shadowcaster.desc: Harnesss the power of Shadow in your mantra crafting.

adept shadowcaster.name: Adept Shadowcaster
adept shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

expert shadowcaster.name: Expert Shadowcaster
expert shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

master shadowcaster.name: Master Shadowcaster
master shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

knight's rally.name: Knight's Rally
knight's rally.desc: When using a shield, you ready your block more quickly after taking a hit.

turtle shell.name: Turtle Shell
turtle shell.desc: If your shield is on your back, take reduced backstab damage and negate Spine Cutter.

emergency repairs.name: Emergency Repairs
emergency repairs.desc: Your repairs are twice as efficient when the ship is on low health. Your repairs scale somewhat with the Max Health of the ship.

spare nails.name: Spare Nails
spare nails.desc: You always keep a couple spare. Your repairs are more efficient and you no longer drop Wood on death.

unnecessary theatrics.name: Unnecessary Theatrics
unnecessary theatrics.desc: Deliver a one-liner on uppercuts, flourishes, and critical attacks that charms your opponents briefly.

a world without song.name: A World Without Song
a world without song.desc:
Every 3-4 hits with a Wind Mantra now procs Suffocate.
[*Note: Takes 4 hits if between 40 and 74 Galebreathe.]

silencer's blade.name: Silencer's Blade
silencer's blade.desc: Meleeing a 'Suffocated' opponent will extend the duration of the Suffocation and grant a speed boost.

oath: silentheart.name: Oath: Silentheart
oath: silentheart.desc:
You vow to reject the Words of the Song, denying yourself of mantras in pursuit of your own path to true strength, no matter the cost. You can wield weapons with half the usual requirements.
[Note: Only reduces requirements by 25, not half.]

ankle cutter.name: Ankle Cutter
ankle cutter.desc: You can now do a special ground slash while sliding, applying a temporary speed debuff to those hit, as well as preventing jumping.

dread fighter.name: Dread Fighter
dread fighter.desc: Parrying and getting hit by mantras now give you stacks of Dread. Each stack increases your mantra resistance, up to 25%. Each stack lasts for 15 seconds.

flow state.name: Flow State
flow state.desc: Enter a moment of extreme focus in which you can change the windup of your special attack with the correct timing.

mayhem.name: Mayhem
mayhem.desc: Initiate a special dash attack by pressing Basic Attack during the start of your dodge.

merciless blade.name: Merciless Blade
merciless blade.desc: You now execute enemies much faster.

relentless hunt.name: Relentless Hunt
relentless hunt.desc: Basic Attack while doing an Aerial Attack to initiate a special gap closer attack.

rising star.name: Rising Star
rising star.desc: Press CTRL + M2 to activate a special uppercut attack.

silent cascade.name: Silent Cascade
silent cascade.desc: Landing physical attacks on an opponent charges up your Silent Cascade, a devastating barrage that can be unleashed with CTRL + M2.

true vantage.name: True Vantage
true vantage.desc: Venting makes you invisible briefly while boosting your speed.

unmatched dexterity.name: Unmatched Dexterity
unmatched dexterity.desc: Press X to Quick Swap between weapons within your toolbar.

vengeful pursuit.name: Vengeful Pursuit
vengeful pursuit.desc: Your running Basic Attacks that don't hit send out a special mid-range crescent projectile that slows on hit. Tracks onto those with their backs turned to you. 8s CD.

friends in high places.name: Friends in High Places
friends in high places.desc: Your connections often let you off the hook when you're in trouble with the law. Nepotism sure does pay!

snake oil.name: Snake Oil
snake oil.desc: Okay, the amount you're charging people for your items is downright criminal. But I'm just a talent description, I can't stop you.

golden tongue.name: Golden Tongue
golden tongue.desc: Typing gives a random buff to you and those around you. (60 second cooldown)

absolute pitch.name: Absolute Pitch
absolute pitch.desc: You can cast Ritual Mantras instantly.

bloodiron spirit.name: Bloodiron Spirit
bloodiron spirit.desc: You regain some Armor upon killing enemies.

oath: soulbreaker.name: Oath: Soulbreaker
oath: soulbreaker.desc: The sum of your fragments is greater than the whole. Though your very being is splintered and threatening to drift apart, every shard of you Vows to remain One. Your Oath is solvent that joins all of your distinct selves into the gestalt you.

formless.name: Formless
formless.desc: Teleport to a location within your Tacet bubble. Receive a slight speed boost when activating Tacet.

heart reverb.name: Heart Reverb
heart reverb.desc: Those picked up by your Rhythm are marked for 8 seconds. Whenever an opponent dodges your attack, detect their rhythm and vigor. You can use Rhythm while standing.

soul infusion.name: Soul Infusion
soul infusion.desc: Infuse Ardour into your executions. If your execute is interrupted, the opponent remains down for a longer amount of time. Your Ardour Screams are projected further.

murmur: ardour [oath].name: Murmur: Ardour [OATH]
murmur: ardour [oath].desc: An application of the Song that enables one to channel the Murmur into raw strength. Press H.

murmur: rhythm [oath].name: Murmur: Rhythm [OATH]
murmur: rhythm [oath].desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to perceive the subtle Murmur emanating from all things. Press G while crouched.

murmur: tacet [oath].name: Murmur: Tacet [OATH]
murmur: tacet [oath].desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to suppress their own murmur. Press T while crouched.

ardour scream [oath].name: Ardour Scream [OATH]
ardour scream [oath].desc: Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. Victims take 25% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10s.

spotter [oath].name: Spotter [OATH]
spotter [oath].desc: Marking enemies while in Rhythm will indicate their health status to your allies.

chime of conflict.name: Chime of Conflict
chime of conflict.desc: Drift in and out of reality, challenging those hailing from distant lands. Grants you the ability to access the PvP Arena.

possession.name: Possession
possession.desc:
After an apparition hits an enemy, receive 15% posture damage on all Galebreath attacks for 6 seconds. If the apparition hits while you have Phantom Step activated, receive a 15% chip damage buff as well for the same duration.
[*This talent loses some effectiveness when below its requirements.]

vanishing wraith.name: Vanishing Wraith
vanishing wraith.desc: Your 'Aerial Attacks' while in Phantom Step will now teleport you behind your target.

apparitions.name: Apparitions
apparitions.desc: Your Haunted Phantoms become Apparitions that apply Winded on hit. Apparitions cannot be parried if you are in Phantom Step.

haunted path: specter.name: Haunted Path: Specter
haunted path: specter.desc: Build up spectral energy by performing successful dodges and landing Wind mantras. Phantom winds from Haunted Gale no longer appear. You can no longer suffocate enemies.

phantom step.name: Phantom Step
phantom step.desc: Press X to begin running at high speeds and your regular dashes transform into gale dashes. (Must have at least 10% Spectral Gauge)

oath: starkindred.name: Oath: Starkindred
oath: starkindred.desc: You vow to feel the knowledge of all that is, all at once. Your heart beats with the world itself, as the Stars above watch over you.

death from above.name: Death From Above
death from above.desc: Upon cancelling your Air Dash, reveal your wings and strike your enemy.

link conduction.name: Link Conduction
link conduction.desc: While you have active tethers your lightning mantras cost less ether.

jumper cables.name: Jumper Cables
jumper cables.desc: Getting knocked with an active tether allows you to steal health from tethered targets and not get knocked.

static ace.name: Static Ace
static ace.desc: Using Lightning Stream with an active tether targets your closest active link.

static allure.name: Static Allure
static allure.desc: Having two active tethers will cause the previous tethered enemy to get magnetized to your newest tethered enemy, also increases the duration of tethers by 15 seconds.

static link.name: Static Link
static link.desc: Flourishing or uppercutting an enemy creates a static link between you and your enemy.

storm link.name: Storm Link
storm link.desc: While you have a Static Link on someone, your Wind mantras that hit them are imbued with flashes of Lightning.

grasp on reality.name: Grasp on Reality
grasp on reality.desc: Damage taken from insanity is reduced.

magical resolve.name: Magical Resolve
magical resolve.desc: Being hit increases Ether regen for a short duration, the strength of the regen scales off your Willpower.

unfazed.name: Unfazed
unfazed.desc: You are more resilient to the side effects of going insane. You no longer Shiver and you Panic with less severity.

sunset ricochet.name: Sunset Ricochet
sunset ricochet.desc:
Your bullets ricochet to a nearby enemy when hitting an opponent.
[*Note: Hits up to two people.]

voltaic conductor.name: Voltaic Conductor
voltaic conductor.desc: Your Thundercall Mantras deal 20% chip damage against enemies with conductor rods.

iron gut [fort].name: Iron Gut [FORT]
iron gut [fort].desc: You have resistance against being poisoned by foods.

iron gut [will].name: Iron Gut [WILL]
iron gut [will].desc: You have resistance against being poisoned by foods.

termite.name: Termite
termite.desc: You can eat things most would consider inedible.

dustlunge.name: Dustlunge
dustlunge.desc:
You can now assassinate enemies from much farther range, shadestepping to their location if they're too far. You automatically assassinate other nearby enemies.
[*This talent loses some effectiveness when below its requirements.]

reqs.from: Lowstride, Lights Out, Deep Wound, Unseen Threat

none left behind.name: None Left Behind
none left behind.desc: You can now shadestep to pick up knocked humanoids far away from you. 4s CD.

punishing blow.name: Punishing Blow
punishing blow.desc: [Heavy Weapons] Daze opponents for 1s when you interrupt their Basic Attack with your own.

foolish outburst.name: Foolish Outburst
foolish outburst.desc:
Blocking or parrying a vent will absorb the Tempo cost of the vent. A Tactician steadies the course of battle.
[*Absorbs 20% to 40% of the vent's Tempo between 20 INT and 50 INT.]

hard read.name: Hard Read
hard read.desc: Hitting your opponent during a feint will cause them to be dazed.

target switch.name: Target Switch
target switch.desc: Parrying an opponent then hitting someone else makes your next mantra free.

water off a duck's back.name: Water off a Duck's Back
water off a duck's back.desc: Venting will shift any elemental status effects affecting you onto those hit by your vent. Will also remove potion splash statuses on vent.

controlled combustion.name: Controlled Combustion
controlled combustion.desc: Your Agitating Spark no longer spreads to your allies. All-Consuming Flame no longer applies against allies.

artisan chef.name: Artisan Chef
artisan chef.desc: The food you cook now becomes Artisan food, increasing it's hunger and thirst gained by +25%.

master chef.name: Master Chef
master chef.desc: Buffs applied by food you cook now have their buffs amplified by +30%.

explosive finish.name: Explosive Finish
explosive finish.desc: If an enemy is on fire when you flourish, blast them away with a fire blast.

flaming flourish.name: Flaming Flourish
flaming flourish.desc: Set enemies on fire when you flourish or uppercut them.

mirage clone.name: Mirage Clone
mirage clone.desc: Successfully dodging leaves a heat mirage clone that sets enemies that swung at you on fire.

emperor flame.name: Emperor Flame
emperor flame.desc: Absorb fire produced by you, once you reach 5 stacks your next attack will be an automatic Explosive Finish flourish.

grasp of eylis.name: Grasp of Eylis
grasp of eylis.desc: You can temporarily teleport to locations near your bounty target, if one can be found. However, you must stay close, or be desynchronised.

voideye.name: Voideye
voideye.desc: Voidmother's blessing, the method to travel back to the Voidheart.

last second negotiations.name: Last Second Negotiations
last second negotiations.desc: Most enemies will hesitate a moment longer before executing you.

another man's trash.name: Another Man's Trash
another man's trash.desc: Take unequipped equipment when mugging a player.

cap artist.name: Cap Artist
cap artist.desc: Pressing [R] while crouching allows you to fake being dead.

master thief.name: Master Thief
master thief.desc: Gain more notes when mugging a player.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.desc: Gain the ability to pickpocket by pressing "N" on a downed person.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: [Light Weapons] On 5th successfull attack you will discharge static dealing lightning damage to those nearby.

windup battery.name: Windup Battery
windup battery.desc: Landing 3 Thundercall Mantras without whiffing reduces the windup of your next Mantra by 10%.

rain of static.name: Rain of Static
rain of static.desc: After successfully casting lightning impact, strike down countless thunder at those below. In return your Lightning Impact will require more time to cast.

gathering electricity [agl].name: Gathering Electricity [AGL]
gathering electricity [agl].desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

gathering electricity [str].name: Gathering Electricity [STR]
gathering electricity [str].desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.desc: Your next dash after activating Static Blade is enhanced by lightning.

static blade.name: Static Blade
static blade.desc: [Medium Weapons] Hitting blocks or blocking or parrying hits will now generate an electric chage in your blade, granting a small speed buff. Charges can stack up to 5 times.

thundercall unbounded.name: Thundercall Unbounded
thundercall unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your thundercall to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Thundercall revokes this Talent.]

static fakeout.name: Static Fakeout
static fakeout.desc: Roll cancelling immediately after a parry will cause you to teleport behind your opponent.

discovery of fire.name: Discovery of Fire
discovery of fire.desc: Flints and Flamecharm are for simpletons.

shocking finish.name: Shocking Finish
shocking finish.desc: Following a flourish up with a lightning beam causes it to be casted instantly.

static flash clone.name: Static Flash Clone
static flash clone.desc: When using lightning clones you disappear leaving behind a static clone for a short duration.

static withdraw.name: Static Withdraw
static withdraw.desc: When being carried use this talent to shock your captor, forcing them to drop you. Bodies of knocked enemies will be charged with electricity which will stun people who attempt to carry them.

stratoshock.name: Stratoshock
stratoshock.desc: Your lightning deals an additional 5% damage when in the rain.

thundercaller.name: Thundercaller
thundercaller.desc: Grants you the ability to command Lightning as a Thundercaller.

adept thundercaller.name: Adept Thundercaller
adept thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Thundercaller mantras.

expert thundercaller.name: Expert Thundercaller
expert thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Thundercaller mantras.

master thundercaller.name: Master Thundercaller
master thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Thundercaller mantras.

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
unbreakable.desc: Reduces the time you spend stunned after being block broken.

manipulator.name: Manipulator
manipulator.desc: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to charmed enemies, but the effect is removed on impact.

narcissist.name: Narcissist
narcissist.desc: Charming an already Charmed opponent Overcharms you briefly. Guess you really were always that great.

sow and mend.name: Sow and Mend
sow and mend.desc: Sacrifice 35% of your blood for temporary health.

cyclical exsanguination.name: Cyclical Exsanguination
cyclical exsanguination.desc: Whenever you deal more than 20 damage to an enemy in an instance, pause your temporary health decay for 3 seconds.

embolism.name: Embolism
embolism.desc: If an enemy is guardbroken while you have temporary health, convert your temporary health into additional damage.

hypovolemic focus.name: Hypovolemic Focus
hypovolemic focus.desc: While you have temporary health, your opponent regains far less posture from parrying you.

cheap shot.name: Cheap Shot
cheap shot.desc:
Your attacks gain up to 10% PEN multiplicatively when you have an active speed boost.
[*Note: 5% to 10% PEN between 20 and 65 Agility.]

crippling comeuppance.name: Crippling Comeuppance
crippling comeuppance.desc:
Landing Revenge puts your opponent's Mobility slot Mantras on CD for 15s.
[*Note: 10s to 15s CD between 50 and 100 Agility.]

down comes the claw.name: Down Comes the Claw
down comes the claw.desc:
Landing a Critical while you have a speed boost prevents your opponent from being able to dodge twice in a row for up to 6.5s.
[*Note: 4s to 6.5s duration between 30 and 75 Agility.]

maiming claws.name: Maiming Claws
maiming claws.desc: Down Comes the Claw now disables your opponents posture regeneration for 6s on proc.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc:
If you land your Revenge, clear the cooldown immediately.
[*Note: 35s to 25s cooldown between 50 and 90 Agility.]

face cutter.name: Face Cutter
face cutter.desc: [Twinblade] Your Spine Cutter now deals an additional hit.

turning of the wheel.name: Turning of the Wheel
turning of the wheel.desc: [Twinblade] After perfect dodging a swing or critical attack, step backwards and ramp up your swingspeed.

burning sacrifice.name: Burning Sacrifice
burning sacrifice.desc: Sacrifice puppets who have been alive for half of their lifetime and burn purple for Flame Emperor Stacks.

reqs.from: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets, Emperor Flame

burning puppets.name: Burning Puppets
burning puppets.desc: Your puppets can now inflict burn and fire-based talents when they explode.

explosive rage.name: Explosive Rage
explosive rage.desc: Causing explosions will make your puppets go into a frenzy - speeding up and dealing slightly more damage.

moths to a flame.name: Moths to a Flame
moths to a flame.desc: Your Twisted Puppets now home towards burning enemies.

wraith path: twisted puppets.name: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets
wraith path: twisted puppets.desc: Your Flamecharm mantras summon puppets of shadow and flame. Your flames are now black.

audacity.name: Audacity
audacity.desc:
Once you've brought down your prey, instill fear into all those who would seperate you from claiming it. Charmed or nearby enemies will fear for longer. Nearby allies gain a 10% damage buff.
[*Note: CD scales from 30s to 40s with your Charisma and Strength stats, between 50 and 150.]

rule through fear.name: Rule Through Fear
rule through fear.desc: Executing an enemy applies Overcharm to nearby allies and yourself.

no survivors.name: No Survivors
no survivors.desc: Your allies and yourself execute faster while affected by Overcharm.

denial repulse.name: Denial Repulse
denial repulse.desc: You now emit a delayed burst of flames after coming close to death.

undying flame.name: Undying Flame
undying flame.desc: Your flame can be casted in the depths. Standing close to your graceful flame will slowly restore sanity for others in the area.

jetstream.name: Jetstream
jetstream.desc: The favor of the winds is yours: landing three hits (five for light weapons) without taking damage against your opponent envelops you in a shield of wind.

simmerbloom.name: Simmerbloom
simmerbloom.desc: Basic Attacks on Pleeksty's Inferno are now granted flames.

umami.name: Umami
umami.desc: Feast on foes with mighty cutlery. Chef Weapons now steal opponents hunger.

grotesque resilience.name: Grotesque Resilience
grotesque resilience.desc:
You take reduced damage from 'Damage over Time' effects. 
[50%, 25% while Flame Within is active.]
[Bleed reduction is 25%.]

battery sapper.name: Battery Sapper
battery sapper.desc: If your Human Battery targets have Ether, it will drain their Ether to help pay for your Mantras. 10s Cd

catalytic strike.name: Catalytic Strike
catalytic strike.desc: Posture breaking an enemy will Overload their Surge stacks.

closed circuit.name: Closed Circuit
closed circuit.desc: Surge Overloads that fail to arc to other opponents will deal additional damage to the Overloaded enemy.

fried circuits.name: Fried Circuits
fried circuits.desc: Overloading an enemy applies Sapped for 5s.

human battery.name: Human Battery
human battery.desc: When you're out of Ether, convert the Surge stacks of nearby enemies into Ether to pay the cost of your Mantras.

surge path: unstable capacitor.name: Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor
surge path: unstable capacitor.desc: Your lightning no longer applies Shock, instead applying Surge. At maximum statics of Surge, your opponents will Overload, sending arcs of lightning in every direction.

flashboil.name: Flashboil
flashboil.desc: Landing Ice/Fire attacks on burning/chilled enemies extinquishes the flame and generates steam.

boiling point.name: Boiling Point
boiling point.desc: Using a fire mantra near your own steam detonates it.

cut to the chase.name: Cut to the Chase
cut to the chase.desc: You can now 'Aerial Attack' to catch enemies who have recently jumped in the air above you as an anti-air attack with reduced Light Attack damage. Upon hitting the opponent briefly hinder them.

speed demon.name: Speed Demon
speed demon.desc:
Your attacks now inflict a reduced-strength bleed while you have a speed boost. 1s cooldown.
[Normal bleed is 15%, this is 7.5%.]

action surge.name: Action Surge
action surge.desc: Adrenaline Surge now increases your swing speed by 0.04s for its duration.

bear trap.name: Bear Trap
bear trap.desc: Landing a hit with your critical makes your opponent unable to jump for a duration. Also slows your opponent.

blade dancer.name: Blade Dancer
blade dancer.desc: Landing an Basic Attack removes your roll cooldown.

spinning swordsman.name: Spinning Swordsman
spinning swordsman.desc: Running attacks do 15% extra damage when you have a speed boost.

oath: visionshaper.name: Oath: Visionshaper
oath: visionshaper.desc: You vow to only see that which you wish to see. Reality itself is malleable, pliable to your deft hands.

cheap trick.name: Cheap Trick
cheap trick.desc: When hit below half health briefly disappear leaving behind an illusion clone to keep your opponent occupied. Briefly disappear after knocking an enemy.

reality shift.name: Reality Shift
reality shift.desc: Command the closest conjured servant to attack their hallucinating target, using either a Critical Attack or a Mantra.

shaper mimicry.name: Shaper Mimicry
shaper mimicry.desc: The servants you have conjured will imitate your actions when you Swing/Block/Parry/Jump.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: Your Sing now stun opponents who are already charmed.

propagandist.name: Propagandist
propagandist.desc: Your Sing will now stir your allies into a frenzy, causing them to become Overcharmed for 15s, applying Charmed to enemies they hit with basic attacks.

command: live.name: Command: Live
command: live.desc:
Once per hour, command a servant to defy all odds and obey your command - live.
[*The cooldown for this Talent scales on your Charisma investment.]

command: summon.name: Command: Summon
command: summon.desc: Command your servant to obey your master and appear before you no matter the distance.

vow of mastery.name: Vow of Mastery
vow of mastery.desc: The Vow of Mastery grants the Master the power to command their Subject. To initiate a vow, you must ask the other player if they'd like to make the vow.e.g."wanna make a vow of mastery?"

chronostasis.name: Chronostasis
chronostasis.desc: Landing an Basic Attack or Critical Strike now puts target resonance on cooldown for a short duration.

critical attack.name: Critical Attack
critical attack.desc: Landing a hit with your critical restores 30% Posture.

reqs.from: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

engage.name: Engage
engage.desc: Landing an Basic Attack slightly restores some of your Ether.

reqs.from: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

scuba drowner.name: Scuba Drowner
scuba drowner.desc: You won't always drown to death when downed in water.

conditioned swimmer.name: Conditioned Swimmer
conditioned swimmer.desc: You lose less hunger and thirst while swimming.

switchblade [hvy].name: Switchblade [HVY]
switchblade [hvy].desc: You can now utilise Dagger talents when not wielding a dagger.

switchblade [med].name: Switchblade [MED]
switchblade [med].desc: You can now utilise Dagger talents when not wielding a dagger.

showstopper.name: Showstopper
showstopper.desc: When an enemy would roll through one of your physical attacks, stomp the ground, dazing anyone nearby. Removes speed buffs from target upon landing.

brutal momentum.name: Brutal Momentum
brutal momentum.desc: [Heavy Weapons] Successfully dodging will give you hyperarmour on your next swing.

matador.name: Matador
matador.desc: Deal +20% more damage to human enemies with hyperarmor.

warrior's swing.name: Warrior's Swing
warrior's swing.desc: Reduces incoming damage if hit during Heavy swing hyper armor.

mercy kill.name: Mercy Kill
mercy kill.desc: When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, you kill them instantly. Enemies that are greatly weaker than you die instantly from a single hit.

reqs.from: Uncap a Weapon or an Attunement stat

haunted gale.name: Haunted Gale
haunted gale.desc: Landing 3 Galebreathe Mantras without whiffing calls forth a Haunted Phantom. The Phantom will attack alongside you for the next 8s before dissipating.

overwhelming might.name: Overwhelming Might
overwhelming might.desc: Strong Left, Table Flip and Skyshatter Kick now all guardbreak at level 5.

chorus of souls.name: Chorus of Souls
chorus of souls.desc: Alone, the Wisps lack a voice. But surrounded by so many, the frequencies overlap and you hear it true.

wisp convergence.name: Wisp Convergence
wisp convergence.desc: When empowered by the Chorus, your Wisps now grant their elements to your strikes.

dark waltz [lht].name: Dark Waltz [LHT]
dark waltz [lht].desc: Anytime you guardbreak your opponent with a light attack or critical, steal half of your opponent's current tempo.

dark waltz [med].name: Dark Waltz [MED]
dark waltz [med].desc: Anytime you guardbreak your opponent with a light attack or critical, steal half of your opponent's current tempo.

dark waltz [hvy].name: Dark Waltz [HVY]
dark waltz [hvy].desc: Anytime you guardbreak your opponent with a light attack or critical, steal half of your opponent's current tempo.

night terror [lht].name: Night Terror [LHT]
night terror [lht].desc: Your light attacks and criticals now proc Fear the Dark.

night terror [med].name: Night Terror [MED]
night terror [med].desc: Your light attacks and criticals now proc Fear the Dark.

night terror [hvy].name: Night Terror [HVY]
night terror [hvy].desc: Your light attacks and criticals now proc Fear the Dark.

ash ember [lht].name: Ash Ember [LHT]
ash ember [lht].desc: The more wither your opponent has the more damage your burn deals.

ash ember [med].name: Ash Ember [MED]
ash ember [med].desc: The more wither your opponent has the more damage your burn deals.

ash ember [hvy].name: Ash Ember [HVY]
ash ember [hvy].desc: The more wither your opponent has the more damage your burn deals.

scorching decay [lht].name: Scorching Decay [LHT]
scorching decay [lht].desc: The wither dealt from your Emperor's Flame is massively increased.

scorching decay [med].name: Scorching Decay [MED]
scorching decay [med].desc: The wither dealt from your Emperor's Flame is massively increased.

scorching decay [hvy].name: Scorching Decay [HVY]
scorching decay [hvy].desc: The wither dealt from your Emperor's Flame is massively increased.

grounding bolt [lht].name: Grounding Bolt [LHT]
grounding bolt [lht].desc: Anytime you summon a lightning strike on your opponent, apply knockdown if it lands.

grounding bolt [med].name: Grounding Bolt [MED]
grounding bolt [med].desc: Anytime you summon a lightning strike on your opponent, apply knockdown if it lands.

grounding bolt [hvy].name: Grounding Bolt [HVY]
grounding bolt [hvy].desc: Anytime you summon a lightning strike on your opponent, apply knockdown if it lands.

frozen anchor [lht].name: Frozen Anchor [LHT]
frozen anchor [lht].desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

frozen anchor [med].name: Frozen Anchor [MED]
frozen anchor [med].desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

frozen anchor [hvy].name: Frozen Anchor [HVY]
frozen anchor [hvy].desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

stasis strike [lht].name: Stasis Strike [LHT]
stasis strike [lht].desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

stasis strike [med].name: Stasis Strike [MED]
stasis strike [med].desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

stasis strike [hvy].name: Stasis Strike [HVY]
stasis strike [hvy].desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

golden age.name: Golden Age
golden age.desc: Your Iron Pull now detonates Crystals and overloads Surges.

reqs.from: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger, Glass Path: Crystallization, Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor

critical engine [med].name: Critical Engine [MED]
critical engine [med].desc: You gain the ability to use Deep Gems on your critical attack. Hold out the Deep Gem you wish to apply to your crit and then use the tool to enhance your critical.

critical engine [hvy].name: Critical Engine [HVY]
critical engine [hvy].desc: You gain the ability to use Deep Gems on your critical attack. Hold out the Deep Gem you wish to apply to your crit and then use the tool to enhance your critical.

critical engine [lht].name: Critical Engine [LHT]
critical engine [lht].desc: You gain the ability to use Deep Gems on your critical attack. Hold out the Deep Gem you wish to apply to your crit and then use the tool to enhance your critical.

unwavering focus.name: Unwavering Focus
unwavering focus.desc: When your mantras are parried, receive less posture (scales with intelligence).

silencer's song [lht].name: Silencer's Song [LHT]
silencer's song [lht].desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

silencer's song [med].name: Silencer's Song [MED]
silencer's song [med].desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

silencer's song [hvy].name: Silencer's Song [HVY]
silencer's song [hvy].desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

finishing slay.name: Finishing Slay
finishing slay.desc: If you land a critical attack while also having stacks from the Chain of Perfection talent, consume all those for a massive damaging attack. This works on other players as well.

blitz.name: Blitz
blitz.desc: Increase how quick you release your Prominence Draw.

belief.name: Belief
belief.desc: Your medium weapon mantras now deal extra damage based on how much Willpower you have.

vital wound.name: Vital Wound
vital wound.desc: Uppercutting your opponent punctures their lungs, slowing their rate of posture recovery for 10 seconds.

rosen's technique.name: Rosen's Technique
rosen's technique.desc: If you use Tactical Reload, Rosen's Peacemaker has 30 seconds less off its cooldown.

expeditious combo.name: Expeditious Combo
expeditious combo.desc: Landing an uppercut will grant you a buff to your Onslaught for 15 seconds, using Onslaught during this time will massively increase the speed of it.

sovereign's counter.name: Sovereign's Counter
sovereign's counter.desc: Improve the efficiency of every counter you use. This effect becomes stronger for Punishment if you have the Riot Breaker talent.

bulwark breaker.name: Bulwark Breaker
bulwark breaker.desc: Increase the size of your Pressure Blast, with the last hit of it dealing increased posture damage.

punishing riposte.name: Punishing Riposte
punishing riposte.desc: When parrying a guardbreak, enhance your critical for the next 4 seconds. If you land your crit on your opponent's block while it is enhanced, immediately guardbreak your opponent.

cruel counter.name: Cruel Counter
cruel counter.desc: When using your initial charge up critical on your Krulian Knife, if you interrupt someone's attack with it apply Cruel Counter on them, massively increasing the damage they take from your critical attacks.

assassin's strike.name: Assassin's Strike
assassin's strike.desc: Your Rapid Slashes now deals twice the amount of damage.

battle frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
battle frenzy.desc: The grip on your weapon tightens, reduce the posture of all mantras you block with this effect scaling with the number of combat tags you have on your character.

curved edge.name: Curved Edge
curved edge.desc: Your light weapon mantras now gain 30% more chip.

stronger under pressure.name: Stronger Under Pressure
stronger under pressure.desc: Your mantras with might gem now slow down your opponents, scaling with how many combat tags you currently have.

destructive yell.name: Destructive Yell
destructive yell.desc: Your ardour screams now break campfires around you.

mass effect.name: Mass Effect
mass effect.desc: For every Might Gem you have equipped on your mantras, slightly increase each Might Gem's power.

offensive recovery.name: Offensive Recovery
offensive recovery.desc: If all your mantras have Might Gems equipped, lose posture anytime you hit an opponents block with a mantra.

flashwind.name: Flashwind
flashwind.desc: Anytime you proc Air Pressure or Overcharge, give yourself the ability to have enhanced dashes again for a few seconds.

stormcall.name: Stormcall
stormcall.desc: Anytime you land a storm strike apply stormcall shock on your opponent, damaging them if they try to use a mantra while its active.

volt draft.name: Volt Draft
volt draft.desc: Using Inhale will now also make your m1s apply a storm strike. [20 second CD]

shock trooper specialist.name: Shock Trooper Specialist
shock trooper specialist.desc: Empower the mantras taught to you by your Legion Specialist Captain. You also now conjure a storm strike on your opponent by landing Gale and Thundercall mantras.

repeated blows.name: Repeated Blows
repeated blows.desc: Any strength mantra that has a Wrath Gem on it will reset its cooldown if you land a critical while a Wrath Gem is active.

crippling impact.name: Crippling Impact
crippling impact.desc: Landing a critical on someone while Wrath Gem is active disables their vent for a few seconds.

fatal strike.name: Fatal Strike
fatal strike.desc: Landing a guardbreak with a strength mantra that has a Wrath Gem on it devastates your opponent, dealing extra damage and slowing them down.

lasting trauma.name: Lasting Trauma
lasting trauma.desc: Anytime you land a Wrath Gem, your opponent becomes fearful, being unable to use their critical for a few seconds after you land it.

volt reflex.name: Volt Reflex
volt reflex.desc: Your dodge window is increased with the power of your lightning, but also increases the cooldown of your dodges.

no interruptions.name: No Interruptions
no interruptions.desc: Wehn combat tagged by 2 or more players, render any ranged attack a lot less effective.

bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty
bloodthirsty.desc: Recover health on hit. When landing a critical, deal 30 bleed damage over 5 seconds.

swift strike.name: Swift Strike
swift strike.desc: Hitting your opponent's back with an M1 will enhance your nextc ritical, turning into a teleport backstab that procs all assassination Talents. Doesn't go away until you cast your critical. 20s CD.

armoured plating.name: Armoured Plating
armoured plating.desc: Put on extra plating on your armor, giving you 50 temporary health whenever you are put in combat. Due to the weight of this additional plating, you have reduced speed at all times.

oppressive force.name: Oppressive Force
oppressive force.desc:
When using a weapon found in the Merit Armoury, gain a unique two-hit flourish that does not knock back opponents and dazes them. Second hit only procs if the first hit.
[*Note: The second hit deals 80% of your weapon's scaled damage and cannot be damage modified otherwise.]

riot shield.name: Riot Shield
riot shield.desc: While you are fighting two or more opponents and are using a shield, reduce the total amount of chip damage you take by 40%.

steel tread.name: Steel Tread
steel tread.desc: Gain a bit of knockback resistance as well as damage resistence against attacks that ragdoll you.

crossguard.name: Crossguard
crossguard.desc: If you are using a sword, you gain 10% chip against other opponents using swords.

executioner's frenzy.name: Executioner's Frenzy
executioner's frenzy.desc: Landing a light attack while an opponent's posture is paused reduces their assassination cooldown by 5 seconds.

backstabber.name: Backstabber
backstabber.desc: Landing a backhit with a light attack causes you to grab your opponent and stab them again, dealing an extra 15 damage.

fatal stealth.name: Fatal Stealth
fatal stealth.desc:
You deal increased backstab damage to opponents based on how high your stealth stat currently is.
[*Note: +0.2% damage per 1 Stealth from Equipment.]

flanking maneuvers.name: Flanking Maneuvers
flanking maneuvers.desc: Enemies you assassinate take more PEN from your squadmates in your party.

stature break.name: Stature Break
stature break.desc: Landing a backstab of any kind disables posture for 8 seconds.

tacet minimization.name: Tacet Minimization
tacet minimization.desc: Focus your Tacet even further, allowing the radius at which you get spotted to become smaller temporarily.

reqs.from: Authority Ensign Origin, Inquisition Division, Murmur: Tacet

buster call.name: Buster Call
buster call.desc:
Radio in the Authority's navy for a buster call, sending out a barrage of bombardment wherever you see fit. 1d CD.
[*Note: Applies burn on hit, doesn't knock players.]

officer's training.name: Officer's Training
officer's training.desc: While using a sword or rapier, take 30% less posture damage from Critical Attacks.

target focus.name: Target Focus
target focus.desc: Enemies you charm take more damage from your squadmates in your party.

absolute force.name: Absolute Force
absolute force.desc: Evolve the technique of your Oppressive Force, letting both hits of your flourish deal 50% more posture damage.

reqs.from: Authority Ensign Origin, Shock Corps Division, Oppressive Force

amp overdrive.name: Amp Overdrive
amp overdrive.desc: When you guardbreak an opponent, double the time they are stunned for. The same is applied to you.

reqs.from: Authority Ensign Origin, Shock Corps Division

martial brutality.name: Martial Brutality
martial brutality.desc: The less health your opponent has, the more posture damage you deal to them.

reqs.from: Authority Ensign Origin, Shock Corps Division

shocking reverb.name: Shocking Reverb
shocking reverb.desc: Landing enough lightning Mantras without getting hit grants you a defensive lightning cloak for 15 seconds, letting you negate damage from light attacks and ironsing. [2 min CD]

reqs.from: Authority Ensign Origin, Shock Corps Division
